rulings.text: The ability that defines Wintermoor Commander's toughness works in all zones, not just the battlefield.
As long as Wintermoor Commander is on the battlefield, its ability will count itself, so it'll be at least 2/1.

Because damage remains marked on a creature until the damage is removed as the turn ends, nonlethal damage dealt to Wintermoor Commander may become lethal if Knights you control leave the battlefield during that turn.

foreignNames.name: Wintermoor-Kommandant
foreignNames.text:
Todesberührung
Die Widerstandskraft des Wintermoor-Kommandanten ist gleich der Anzahl an Rittern, die du kontrollierst.
Immer wenn der Wintermoor-Kommandant angreift, erhält ein anderer Ritter deiner Wahl, den du kontrollierst, Unzerstörbarkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Schaden und Effekte, die „zerstören", zerstören ihn nicht.)

foreignNames.name: Comandante de Yermo Gélido
foreignNames.text:
Toque mortal.
La resistencia del Comandante de Yermo Gélido es igual a la cantidad de Caballeros que controlas.
Siempre que el Comandante de Yermo Gélido ataque, otro Caballero objetivo que controlas gana la habilidad de indestructible hasta el final del turno. (El daño y los efectos que dicen "destruir" no lo destruyen.)

foreignNames.name: Commandant de Hivermoor
foreignNames.text:
Contact mortel
L'endurance du Commandant de Hivermoor est égale au nombre de chevaliers que vous contrôlez.
À chaque fois que le Commandant de Hivermoor attaque, un autre chevalier ciblé que vous contrôlez acquiert l'indestructible jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Les blessures et les effets qui disent « détruisez » ne la détruisent pas.)

foreignNames.name: Comandante di Landa d'Inverno
foreignNames.text:
Tocco letale
La costituzione del Comandante di Landa d'Inverno è pari al numero di Cavalieri che controlli.
Ogniqualvolta il Comandante di Landa d'Inverno attacca, un altro Cavaliere bersaglio che controlli ha indistruttibile fino alla fine del turno. (Il danno e gli effetti che dicono "distruggi" non lo distruggono.)

foreignNames.name: 冬荒野の指揮官
foreignNames.text:
接死
冬荒野の指揮官のタフネスは、あなたがコントロールしている騎士の総数に等しい。
冬荒野の指揮官が攻撃するたび、あなたがコントロールしている他の騎士１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは破壊不能を得る。（ダメージや「破壊」と書かれた効果では、それは破壊されない。）
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・騎士

foreignNames.name: 겨울황야 지휘관
foreignNames.text:
치명타
겨울황야 지휘관의 방어력은 당신이 조종하는 기사의 수와 같다.
겨울황야 지휘관이 공격할 때마다, 당신이 조종하는 다른 기사를 목표로 정한다. 그 기사는 턴종료까지 무적을 얻는다. (피해와 "파괴"라고 명시된 효과로 파괴되지 않는다.)

foreignNames.name: Comandante de Hiberlama
foreignNames.text:
Toque mortífero
A resistência de Comandante de Hiberlama é igual ao número de Cavaleiros que você controla.
Toda vez que Comandante de Hiberlama ataca, outro Cavaleiro alvo que você controla ganha indestrutível até o final do turno. (O dano e os efeitos que dizem "destrua" não o destroem.)

foreignNames.name: Командир из Вечнозимья
foreignNames.text:
Смертельное касание
Выносливость Командира из Вечнозимья равна количеству Рыцарей под вашим контролем.
Каждый раз, когда Командир из Вечнозимья атакует, другой целевой Рыцарь под вашим контролем получает Неразрушимость до конца хода. (Повреждения и эффекты с указанием «уничтожьте» не уничтожают его.)

foreignNames.name: 冬霜沼指挥官
foreignNames.text:
死触
冬霜沼指挥官的防御力等同于由你操控的骑士数量。
每当冬霜沼指挥官攻击时，另一个目标由你操控的骑士获得不灭异能直到回合结束。（伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将它消灭。）

foreignNames.name: 冬霜沼指揮官
foreignNames.text:
死觸
冬霜沼指揮官的防禦力等同於由你操控的騎士數量。
每當冬霜沼指揮官攻擊時，另一個目標由你操控的騎士獲得不滅異能直到回合結束。（傷害與註明「消滅」的效應不會將它消滅。）

originalText:
Deathtouch
Wintermoor Commander's toughness is equal to the number of Knights you control.
Whenever Wintermoor Commander attacks, another target Knight you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

name: Arcanist's Owl
text:
Flying
When Arcanist's Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact or enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

foreignNames.name: Eule des Arkanisten
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wenn die Eule des Arkanisten ins Spiel kommt, schaue dir die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst davon eine Artefakt- oder Verzauberungskarte offen vorzeigen und auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest in zufälliger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Búho del arcanista
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Búho del arcanista entre al campo de batalla, mira las cuatro primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes mostrar una carta de artefacto o de encantamiento que se encuentre entre ellas y ponerla en tu mano. Pon el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en un orden aleatorio.

foreignNames.name: Hibou de l'arcaniste
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Quand le Hibou de l'arcaniste arrive sur le champ de bataille, regardez les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez révéler une carte d'artefact ou d'enchantement parmi elles et la mettre dans votre main. Mettez le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque dans un ordre aléatoire.

foreignNames.name: Gufo dell'Arcanista
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Quando il Gufo dell'Arcanista entra nel campo di battaglia, guarda le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi rivelare una carta artefatto o incantesimo scelta tra esse e aggiungerla alla tua mano. Metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in ordine casuale.

foreignNames.name: 秘儀術師のフクロウ
foreignNames.text:
飛行
秘儀術師のフクロウが戦場に出たとき、あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを４枚見る。あなたはその中からアーティファクトかエンチャントであるカード１枚を公開してあなたの手札に加えてもよい。残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に無作為の順番で置く。
foreignNames.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — 鳥

foreignNames.name: 비전술사의 올빼미
foreignNames.text:
비행
비전술사의 올빼미가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 네 장을 본다. 당신은 그중에서 마법물체 또는 부여마법 카드 한 장을 공개하고 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. 나머지 카드들은 무작위 순서로 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓는다.

foreignNames.name: Coruja do Arcanista
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Quando Coruja do Arcanista entrar no campo de batalha, olhe os quatro cards do topo de seu grimório. Você pode revelar um card de artefato ou encantamento dentre eles e colocá-lo em sua mão. Coloque o restante no fundo de seu grimório em ordem aleatória.

foreignNames.name: Сова Арканиста
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Когда Сова Арканиста выходит на поле битвы, посмотрите четыре верхние карты вашей библиотеки. Вы можете показать находящуюся среди них карту артефакта или чар и положить ее в вашу руку. Положите остальные карты в низ вашей библиотеки в случайном порядке.

foreignNames.name: 奥术师的猫头鹰
foreignNames.text:
飞行
当奥术师的猫头鹰进战场时，检视你牌库顶的四张牌。你可以展示其中的一张神器或结界牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

foreignNames.name: 奧術師的貓頭鷹
foreignNames.text:
飛行
當奧術師的貓頭鷹進戰場時，檢視你牌庫頂的四張牌。你可以展示其中的一張神器或結界牌，並將它置於你手上。將其餘的牌以隨機順序置於你的牌庫底。

originalText:
Flying
When Arcanist's Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact or enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Covetous Urge
text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's graveyard or hand and exile it. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

rulings.text: If you cast an Adventure with Covetous Urge, it's you, not the card's owner, who may cast the creature later.
Covetous Urge's effect doesn't change when you can cast the exiled card. For example, if you exile a sorcery card, you can cast it only during your main phase when the stack is empty.
Casting an exiled card causes it to leave exile. You can't cast it multiple times.
In a multiplayer game, if a player leaves the game, all cards that player owns leave as well. If you leave the game, the spell or permanent you control from Covetous Urge's effect is exiled.

foreignNames.name: Gieriges Verlangen
foreignNames.text: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Du bestimmst eine Nichtland-Karte im Friedhof oder auf der Hand jenes Spielers und schickst sie ins Exil. Du kannst die Karte wirken, solange sie im Exil ist, und um sie zu wirken kannst du Mana ausgeben, als wäre es Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.

foreignNames.name: Ansia codiciosa
foreignNames.text: El oponente objetivo muestra su mano. Elige una carta que no sea tierra del cementerio o la mano de ese jugador y exíliala. Puedes lanzar esa carta mientras permanezca exiliada, y puedes usar maná como si fuera maná de cualquier color para lanzarla.

foreignNames.name: Pulsion cupide
foreignNames.text: L'adversaire ciblé révèle sa main. Vous choisissez une carte non-terrain dans le cimetière ou la main de ce joueur et vous l'exilez. Vous pouvez lancer cette carte tant qu'elle reste exilée, et vous pouvez dépenser du mana comme s'il s'agissait de mana de n'importe quelle couleur pour lancer ce sort.

foreignNames.name: Impulso Bramoso
foreignNames.text: Un avversario bersaglio rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta non terra dal cimitero o dalla mano di quel giocatore ed esiliala. Puoi lanciare quella carta fintanto che rimane esiliata e puoi spendere mana come se fosse mana di qualsiasi colore per lanciarla.

foreignNames.name: 欲深い衝動
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札を公開する。あなたはそのプレイヤーの墓地か手札から土地でないカード１枚を選び、それを追放する。それが追放され続けているかぎり、あなたはそのカードを唱えてもよく、その呪文を唱えるために任意のマナを望む色のマナであるかのように支払ってもよい。

foreignNames.name: 갈망하는 충동
foreignNames.text: 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 손을 공개한다. 당신은 그 플레이어의 무덤 또는 손에서 대지가 아닌 카드 한 장을 골라 추방한다. 당신은 그 카드가 추방된 상태로 남아 있는 한 그 카드를 발동할 수 있으며, 그 주문을 발동하기 위한 마나는 당신이 원하는 색의 마나인 것처럼 사용할 수 있다.

foreignNames.name: Impulso Cobiçoso
foreignNames.text: O oponente alvo revela a própria mão. Você escolhe um card que não seja um terreno do cemitério ou da mão daquele jogador e o exila. Você pode conjurar aquele card enquanto ele permanecer exilado, e pode gastar mana como se fosse de qualquer cor para conjurar aquela mágica.

foreignNames.name: Алчный Порыв
foreignNames.text: Целевой оппонент показывает свою руку. Вы выбираете карту, не являющуюся землей, из кладбища или руки того игрока и изгоняете ее. Вы можете разыграть ту карту, пока она остается в изгнании, и вы можете тратить ману на разыгрывание того заклинания, как если бы это была мана любого цвета.

foreignNames.name: 贪婪索求
foreignNames.text: 目标对手展示其手牌。你从该牌手的坟墓场或手牌选择一张非地牌将该牌放逐。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以施放该牌，且你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放该咒语的费用。

foreignNames.name: 貪婪索求
foreignNames.text: 目標對手展示其手牌。你從該玩家的墳墓場或手牌選擇一張非地牌並將該牌放逐。於該牌持續放逐的時段內，你可以施放該牌，且你可以將魔法力視同任意顏色的魔法力來支付施放該咒語的費用。

originalText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's graveyard or hand and exile it. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

name: Deathless Knight
text:
Haste
When you gain life for the first time each turn, return Deathless Knight from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"Headed to the wilds? Beware the dead riders who serve the Shadow Queen."
—Scalan, Edgewall innkeeper

rulings.text: Deathless Knight must be in your graveyard immediately after you gain life for its last ability to trigger. If you gain life due to damage from a source with lifelink, and that damage is dealt at the same time that lethal damage is dealt to Deathless Knight, it won't be in your graveyard until state-based actions are performed a moment later, and so the ability can't trigger.
If Deathless Knight enters your graveyard after you've gained life in a turn, its last ability can't trigger during that turn.

foreignNames.name: Todloser Ritter
foreignNames.text:
Eile
Wenn du zum ersten Mal in einem Zug Lebenspunkte dazuerhältst, bringe den Todlosen Ritter aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Du willst in die Wildnis? Hüte dich vor den toten Reitern, die der Schattenkönigin dienen."
—Scalan, Wirt von Wallstädt

foreignNames.name: Caballero inmortal
foreignNames.text:
Prisa.
Cuando ganes vidas por primera vez cada turno, regresa el Caballero inmortal de tu cementerio a tu mano.
foreignNames.flavor:
"¿Vas a las tierras salvajes? Ten cuidado con los jinetes muertos que sirven a la Reina Sombría".
—Scalan, posadero de Extremuro

foreignNames.name: Chevalier immortel
foreignNames.text:
Célérité
Quand vous gagnez des points de vie pour la première fois à chaque tour, renvoyez le Chevalier immortel depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Vous allez dans les friches ? Méfiez-vous des cavaliers trépassés qui servent la Reine des Ombres. »
—Scalan, tavernier de Bornemur

foreignNames.name: Cavaliere Immortale
foreignNames.text:
Rapidità
Quando guadagni punti vita per la prima volta in ogni turno, riprendi in mano il Cavaliere Immortale dal tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Siete diretti nelle terre selvagge? Guardatevi dai cavalieri morti che servono la Regina dell'Ombra."
—Scalan, locandiere di Estremuro

foreignNames.name: 不死の騎士
foreignNames.text:
速攻
あなたが各ターン最初にライフを得たとき、あなたの墓地から不死の騎士をあなたの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — スケルトン・騎士
foreignNames.flavor:
「僻境に向かうのか？影の女王に仕える騎士の亡霊には気を付けな。」
――エッジウォールの亭主、スカラン

foreignNames.name: 죽음을 모르는 기사
foreignNames.text:
신속
당신이 매 턴 처음으로 생명점을 얻을 때, 죽음을 모르는 기사를 당신의 무덤에서 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"야생지로 가는가? 그림자 여왕을 섬기는 망자 기수들을 조심하게."
—언저리방벽 여관주인, 스칼란

foreignNames.name: Cavaleiro Imorredouro
foreignNames.text:
Ímpeto
Quando você ganhar pontos de vida pela primeira vez a cada turno, devolva Cavaleiro Imorredouro de seu cemitério para sua mão.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Vai para as terras selvagens? Cuidado com os ginetes mortos que servem à Rainha das Sombras."
— Scalan, estalajadeiro de Beiramuro

foreignNames.name: Неумирающий Рыцарь
foreignNames.text:
Ускорение
Когда вы получаете жизнь(-и) в первый раз в каждом ходу, верните Неумирающего Рыцаря из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Отправляешься в дикие дебри? Берегись мертвых всадников, что служат Королеве Теней».
— Скалан, трактирщик Пограничного Оплота

foreignNames.name: 不亡骑士
foreignNames.text:
敏捷
每当你每回合首度获得生命时，将不亡骑士从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor:
「要去幻野？当心效忠暗影女王的亡灵骑兵。」
～边墙镇旅店主斯凯兰

foreignNames.name: 不亡騎士
foreignNames.text:
敏捷
每當你每回合首度獲得生命時，將不亡騎士從你的墳墓場移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor:
「要去幻野？當心效忠暗影女王的亡靈騎兵。」
～邊牆鎮旅店主斯凱蘭

originalText:
Haste
When you gain life for the first time each turn, return Deathless Knight from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Elite Headhunter
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{B/R}{B/R}{B/R}, Sacrifice another creature or an artifact: Elite Headhunter deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
flavor: Nothing remains of his foes but the gripping story of their downfall.

rulings.text: If Elite Headhunter somehow becomes an artifact, you can sacrifice it to pay the cost of its activated ability.

foreignNames.name: Elite-Kopfgeldjäger
foreignNames.text:
Bedrohlich (Diese Kreatur kann nicht geblockt werden, außer von zwei oder mehr Kreaturen.)
{B/R}{B/R}{B/R}, opfere eine andere Kreatur oder ein Artefakt: Der Elite-Kopfgeldjäger fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Planeswalker deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Von seinen Gegnern bleibt nichts außer der fesselnden Geschichte ihres Untergangs.

foreignNames.name: Cazacabezas de élite
foreignNames.text:
Amenaza. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por dos o más criaturas.)
{B/R}{B/R}{B/R}, sacrificar otra criatura o un artefacto: El Cazacabezas de élite hace 2 puntos de daño a la criatura o planeswalker objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Nada queda de sus enemigos salvo la fascinante historia de su caída.

foreignNames.name: Chasseur de têtes d'élite
foreignNames.text:
Menace (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par deux créatures ou plus.)
{B/R}{B/R}{B/R}, sacrifiez une autre créature ou un artefact : Le Chasseur de têtes d'élite inflige 2 blessures à une cible, créature ou planeswalker.
foreignNames.flavor: Il ne reste de ses ennemis que l'histoire captivante de leur chute.

foreignNames.name: Cacciatore di Teste d'Elite
foreignNames.text:
Minacciare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da due o più creature.)
{B/R}{B/R}{B/R}, Sacrifica un'altra creatura o un artefatto: Il Cacciatore di Teste d'Elite infligge 2 danni a una creatura o a un planeswalker bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Dei suoi nemici non resta nulla tranne l'avvincente storia della loro sconfitta.

foreignNames.name: 首狩りの精鋭
foreignNames.text:
威迫（このクリーチャーは２体以上のクリーチャーによってしかブロックされない。）
{B/R}{B/R}{B/R}, 他のクリーチャー１体かアーティファクト１つを生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体を対象とする。首狩りの精鋭はそれに２点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・騎士
foreignNames.flavor: 敵の痕跡は何も残さない。残るのは、その鮮やかな敗北の物語のみ。

foreignNames.name: 정예 인간사냥꾼
foreignNames.text:
호전적 (이 생물은 두 개 이상의 생물에만 방어될 수 있다.)
{B/R}{B/R}{B/R}, 다른 생물 또는 마법물체 한 개를 희생한다: 생물 또는 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 정예 인간사냥꾼은 그 목표에게 피해 2점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 그의 적들은 어떻게 몰락했는지에 대한 흥미진진한 이야기 이외에는 아무것도 남기지 않는다.

foreignNames.name: Caçador de Cabeças de Elite
foreignNames.text:
Ameaçar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por duas ou mais criaturas.)

name: Oakhame Ranger // Bring Back
text: {T}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it's in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose mana value is 1. It can't be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card's normal characteristics. The spell's color, mana cost, mana value, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it's legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can't cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won't be exiled and the spell's controller won't be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won't give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.
You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you'll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it's not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it's a token) or cease to be a copy (if it's a nontoken permanent), and so you won't be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn't casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.

{W/B}{W/B}{W/B} : La Cavalière déterminée acquiert l'indestructible jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Les blessures et les effets qui disent « détruisez » ne la détruisent pas.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Respecter les friches ? Bien sûr. Les craindre ? Non. »

foreignNames.name: Cavalcante Risoluta
foreignNames.text:
{W/B}{W/B}: La Cavalcante Risoluta ha legame vitale fino alla fine del turno.
{W/B}{W/B}{W/B}: La Cavalcante Risoluta ha indistruttibile fino alla fine del turno. (Il danno e gli effetti che dicono "distruggi" non la distruggono.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Rispettare le terre selvagge? Certo. Temerle? No."

foreignNames.name: 揺るぎない騎士
foreignNames.text:
{W/B}{W/B}：ターン終了時まで、揺るぎない騎士は絆魂を得る。
{W/B}{W/B}{W/B}：ターン終了時まで、揺るぎない騎士は破壊不能を得る。（ダメージや「破壊」と書かれた効果では、それは破壊されない。）
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・騎士
foreignNames.flavor: 「僻境を尊重するかって？もちろんよ。恐れるかって？それはないわ。」

foreignNames.name: 단호한 기수
foreignNames.text:
{W/B}{W/B}: 단호한 기수는 턴종료까지 생명연결을 얻는다.
{W/B}{W/B}{W/B}: 단호한 기수는 턴종료까지 무적을 얻는다. (피해와 "파괴"라고 명시된 효과로 파괴되지 않는다.)
foreignNames.flavor: "야생지를 존중하라고? 물론이지. 그들을 두려워하라고? 그건 아니야."

foreignNames.name: Ginete Resoluta
foreignNames.text:
{W/B}{W/B}: Ginete Resoluta ganha vínculo com a vida até o final do turno.
{W/B}{W/B}{W/B}: Ginete Resoluta ganha indestrutível até o final do turno. (O dano e os efeitos que dizem "destrua" não a destroem.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Respeitar as terras selvagens? Certamente. Temê-las? Não."

foreignNames.name: Непоколебимая Всадница
foreignNames.text:
{W/B}{W/B}: Непоколебимая Всадница получает Цепь жизни до конца хода.
{W/B}{W/B}{W/B}: Непоколебимая Всадница получает Неразрушимость до конца хода. (Повреждения и эффекты с указанием «уничтожьте» не уничтожают ее.)
foreignNames.flavor: «Уважать дикие дебри? Несомненно. Бояться их? Нет».

foreignNames.name: 坚毅骑兵
foreignNames.text:
{W/B}{W/B}：坚毅骑兵获得系命异能直到回合结束。
{W/B}{W/B}{W/B}：坚毅骑兵获得不灭异能直到回合结束。（伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将它消灭。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「尊重幻野？当然。惧怕它们？绝不。」

foreignNames.name: 堅毅騎兵
foreignNames.text:
{W/B}{W/B}：堅毅騎兵獲得繫命異能直到回合結束。
{W/B}{W/B}{W/B}：堅毅騎兵獲得不滅異能直到回合結束。（傷害與註明「消滅」的效應不會將它消滅。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「尊重幻野？當然。懼怕它們？絕不。」

originalText:
{WB}{WB}: Resolute Rider gains lifelink until end of turn.
{WB}{WB}{WB}: Resolute Rider gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

name: Thunderous Snapper
text: Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, draw a card.
flavor: While humans hear only a deafening roar, the fae hear music of breathtaking beauty.

rulings.text: For spells with {X} in their mana costs, use the value chosen for X to determine the spell's mana value.
Thunderous Snapper's ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.

foreignNames.name: Donnernder Schnapper
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn du einen Zauberspruch mit umgewandelten Manakosten von 5 oder mehr wirkst, ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: Während Menschen nur ohrenbetäubendes Brüllen hören, hören die Feen atemberaubend schöne Musik.

foreignNames.name: Quelonio atronador
foreignNames.text: Siempre que lances un hechizo con coste de maná convertido de 5 o más, roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Mientras los humanos solo oyen un rugido ensordecedor, las hadas escuchan una música de una belleza impresionante.

foreignNames.name: Claqueur tonitruant
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort avec un coût converti de mana supérieur ou égal à 5, piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Là où les humains n'entendent qu'un cri assourdissant, les fæs entendent une musique d'une beauté époustouflante.

foreignNames.name: Mordace Tonante
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia con costo di mana convertito pari o superiore a 5, pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Mentre gli umani percepiscono solo un ruggito assordante, le fate odono una melodia così soave da lasciarle senza fiato.

foreignNames.name: 雷声のカミツキガメ
foreignNames.text: あなたが、点数で見たマナ・コストが５以上の呪文を唱えるたび、カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 海亀・ハイドラ
foreignNames.flavor: 人間たちには耳をつんざくような叫びしか聞こえない一方で、フェイには息をのむほど美しい音楽が聞こえていた。

foreignNames.name: 천둥 같은 거북
foreignNames.text: 당신이 전환마나비용이 5 이상인 주문을 발동할 때마다, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 인간들에게는 귀를 멀게 하는 포효만이 들리지만, 요정들에게는 숨을 멎게 하는 아름다운 음악 소리가 들린다.

foreignNames.name: Abocanhador Trovejante
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que você conjurar uma mágica com custo de mana convertido igual ou superior a 5, compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: Enquanto os humanos ouvem apenas um rugido ensurdecedor, as fadinas ouvem uma música bonita de tirar o fôlego.

foreignNames.name: Громогласная Черепаха
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете заклинание с конвертированной мана-стоимостью 5 или больше, возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Там, где люди слышат только оглушительный рев, феи слышат музыку захватывающей дух красоты.

foreignNames.name: 雷动巨嘴龟
foreignNames.text: 每当你施放总法术力费用等于或大于5的咒语时，抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 传到人类耳中的，只有震耳欲聋的怒吼；而传到仙儿耳中的，则是美妙绝伦的天籁。

foreignNames.name: 雷動巨嘴龜
foreignNames.text: 每當你施放總魔法力費用等於或大於5的咒語時，抽一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 傳到人類耳中的，只有震耳欲聾的怒吼；而傳到仙兒耳中的，則是美妙絕倫的天籟。

originalText: Whenever you cast a spell with converted mana cost 5 or greater, draw a card.

name: Clockwork Servant
text: Adamant — When Clockwork Servant enters the battlefield, if at least three mana of the same color was spent to cast it, draw a card.
flavor: Some are annoyed by the constant ticking as they clean the cobbles, but to the castle custodians, there's no sweeter sound.

rulings.text: If an effect allows you to cast a spell without paying its mana cost, you can't choose to cast it and pay unless another rule or effect allows you to cast that spell for a cost. Similarly, you can't waive a cost reduction unless that effect says you may.

Adamant effects check what mana was actually spent to cast a spell. If an effect allows you to spend mana “as though it were mana” of any color or type, that allows you to spend mana you couldn't otherwise spend, but it doesn't change what mana you spent to cast the spell.
If you copy a spell that has an adamant ability, no mana was spent to cast the copy at all, so that ability won't apply.

foreignNames.name: Mechanischer Diener
foreignNames.text: Adamant — Wenn der Mechanische Diener ins Spiel kommt und falls drei oder mehr Mana derselben Farbe ausgegeben wurden, um ihn zu wirken, ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: Manche ärgert das ständige Ticken, während sie die Pflastersteine reinigen, aber für die Wächter des Schlosses gibt es keinen süßeren Klang.

foreignNames.name: Sirviente mecánico
foreignNames.text: Tesón — Cuando el Sirviente mecánico entre al campo de batalla, si se usaron al menos tres manás del mismo color para lanzarlo, roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Hay a quien le molesta su tictac continuo mientras friega los adoquines, pero para los custodios del castillo no existe un sonido más dulce.

foreignNames.name: Serviteur mécanique
foreignNames.text: Inflexible — Quand le Serviteur mécanique arrive sur le champ de bataille, si au moins trois manas de la même couleur ont été dépensés pour le lancer, piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Le tic-tac perpétuel qu'il produit en nettoyant les pavés en exaspère certains, mais pour les gardiens du château, il n'y a pas de son plus agréable.

foreignNames.name: Servitore Meccanico
foreignNames.text: Adamantino — Quando il Servitore Meccanico entra nel campo di battaglia, se sono stati spesi almeno tre mana dello stesso colore per lanciarlo, pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Il loro costante ticchettio mentre puliscono i ciottoli per alcuni è fastidioso, ma per i custodi del castello non c'è suono più dolce.

foreignNames.name: 機械仕掛けの召使い
foreignNames.text: 一徹 ― 機械仕掛けの召使いが戦場に出たとき、これを唱えるために同じ色のマナが３点以上支払われていたなら、カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — ノーム
foreignNames.flavor: 敷石を掃除するチクタクという音を耳障りだと言う者もいたが、城の守衛にとっては心地よい響きだった。

foreignNames.name: 태엽장치 하인
foreignNames.text: 단호 — 태엽장치 하인이 전장에 들어올 때, 태엽장치 하수인을 발동하는 데 적어도 같은 색 마나 세 개가 지불되었다면, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 사람들 몇몇은 그것들이 자갈길을 청소하면서 계속 딸깍거리는 소리를 내는 것을 거슬려 하지만, 성 관리인들에게는 그것보다 더 감미로운 소리가 없다.

foreignNames.name: Servo de Corda
foreignNames.text: Obstinação — Quando Servo de Corda entrar no campo de batalha, se ao menos três manas da mesma cor tiverem sido gastos para conjurá-lo, compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: Alguns se incomodam com o clique-claque constante enquanto eles limpam as pedras, mas, para os zeladores do castelo, não há som mais doce.

foreignNames.name: Заводной Слуга
foreignNames.text: Твердость — Когда Заводной Слуга выходит на поле битвы, если на его разыгрывание было потрачено три или больше маны одного и того же цвета, возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Некоторых раздражает постоянное тиканье этих малышей, натирающих брусчатку полов, но для смотрителей замка нет звука приятнее.

foreignNames.name: 发条仆从
foreignNames.text: 固色～当发条仆从进战场时，若施放它时支付过至少三点相同颜色的法术力，则抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 它们在清理地面时发出的滴答声让有些人厌烦不已，但对于城堡的监卫而言，这个声音再美妙不过。

foreignNames.name: 發條僕從
foreignNames.text: 固色～當發條僕從進戰場時，若施放它時支付過至少三點相同顏色的魔法力，則抽一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 它們在清理地面時發出的滴答聲讓有些人厭煩不已，但對於城堡的監衛而言，這個聲音再美妙不過。

originalText: Adamant — When Clockwork Servant enters the battlefield, if at least three mana of the same color was spent to cast it, draw a card.

name: Crashing Drawbridge
text:
Defender
{T}: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.
flavor:
"The Northern Beacon flared, and even before the drawbridge finished its descent, the knights charged out."
—*Legend of the Gilded Knights*

foreignNames.name: Krachende Zugbrücke
foreignNames.text:
Verteidiger
{T}: Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, erhalten Eile bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Das Nördliche Signalfeuer wurde entzündet, und noch ehe die Zugbrücke ganz heruntergelassen war, stürmten die Ritter hinaus."
—*Legende der Güldenen Ritter*

foreignNames.name: Puente levadizo
foreignNames.text:
Defensor.
{T}: Las criaturas que controlas ganan la habilidad de prisa hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"La almenara septentrional se encendió y, antes de que el puente levadizo bajara del todo, los caballeros cargaron".
—*Leyenda de los Caballeros Áureos*

foreignNames.name: Pont-levis d'assaut
foreignNames.text:
Défenseur
{T} : Les créatures que vous contrôlez acquièrent la célérité jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Le Flambeau du Nord s'illumina, et avant même que le pont-levis n'ait terminé sa descente, les chevaliers chargèrent. »
—*Légende des Chevaliers dorés*

foreignNames.name: Ponte Levatoio in Caduta
foreignNames.text:
Difensore
{T}: Le creature che controlli hanno rapidità fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Il Faro del Nord si accese e, ancor prima che il ponte levatoio terminasse di scendere, i cavalieri partirono alla carica."
—*Leggenda dei Cavalieri Dorati*

foreignNames.name: 跳ね橋
foreignNames.text:
防衛
{T}：ターン終了時まで、あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャーは速攻を得る。
foreignNames.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — 壁
foreignNames.flavor:
「北の標は炎上した。跳ね橋がまだ下がりきらないうちに騎士たちは外へと駆け出した。」
――*金色騎士の伝説*

foreignNames.name: 도개교 부수기
foreignNames.text:
수비태세
{T}: 당신이 조종하는 생물들은 턴종료까지 신속을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"북부 봉화가 불을 밝혔고, 도개교가 다 내려지기도 전에, 기사들이 돌격해 나갔다."
—*금박 기사단의 전설*

foreignNames.name: Ponte Levadiça Esmagadora
foreignNames.text:
Defensor
{T}: As criaturas que você controla ganham ímpeto até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"O Farol Setentrional acendeu-se e, antes mesmo da ponte levadiça terminar de baixar, os cavaleiros partiram em carga."
— *Lenda dos Cavaleiros Dourados*

foreignNames.name: Опускающийся Мост
foreignNames.text:
Защитник
{T}: существа под вашим контролем получают Ускорение до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Вспыхнул Северный маяк, и еще до того, как успел до конца опуститься мост, рыцари устремились в атаку».
— *«Легенда о Золоченых рыцарях»*

foreignNames.name: 城门吊桥
foreignNames.text:
守军
{T}：由你操控的生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor:
「只见北部烽火信标一亮，城内骑士等不及吊桥落稳便鱼贯而出。」
～*《金辉骑士传》*

foreignNames.name: 城門吊橋
foreignNames.text:
守軍
{T}：由你操控的生物獲得敏捷異能直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor:
「只見北部烽火信標一亮，城內騎士等不及吊橋落穩便魚貫而出。」
～*《金輝騎士傳》*

originalText:
Defender
{T}: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.

name: Enchanted Carriage
text:
When Enchanted Carriage enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Mouse creature tokens.
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

foreignNames.name: Verzauberte Kutsche
foreignNames.text:
Wenn die Verzauberte Kutsche ins Spiel kommt, erzeuge zwei 1/1 weiße Maus-Kreaturenspielsteine.
Bemannen 2 (Tappe eine beliebige Anzahl an Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst und die zusammen Stärke 2 oder mehr haben: Dieses Fahrzeug wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer Artefaktkreatur.)

foreignNames.name: Carruaje encantado
foreignNames.text:
Cuando el Carruaje encantado entre al campo de batalla, crea dos fichas de criatura Ratón blancas 1/1.
Tripular 2. (Girar cualquier cantidad de criaturas que controlas con una fuerza total de 2 o más: Este Vehículo se convierte en una criatura artefacto hasta el final del turno.)

foreignNames.name: Carrosse enchanté
foreignNames.text:
Quand le Carrosse enchanté arrive sur le champ de bataille, créez deux jetons de créature 1/1 blanche Souris.
Pilotage 2 (Engagez n'importe quel nombre de créatures que vous contrôlez dont la force totale est supérieure ou égale à 2 : Ce véhicule devient une créature-artefact jusqu'à la fin du tour.)

foreignNames.name: Carrozza Incantata
foreignNames.text:
Quando la Carrozza Incantata entra nel campo di battaglia, crea due pedine creatura Topo 1/1 bianche.
Manovrare 2 (TAPpa un qualsiasi numero di creature che controlli con forza totale pari o superiore a 2: Questo Veicolo diventa una creatura artefatto fino alla fine del turno.)

foreignNames.name: 魔法の馬車
foreignNames.text:
魔法の馬車が戦場に出たとき、白の１/１のハツカネズミ・クリーチャー・トークンを２体生成する。
搭乗２（あなたがコントロールしている望む数のクリーチャーを、パワーの合計が２以上になるように選んでタップする：ターン終了時まで、この機体はアーティファクト・クリーチャーになる。）
foreignNames.type: アーティファクト — 機体

foreignNames.name: 마법이 걸려 있는 마차
foreignNames.text:
마법이 걸려 있는 마차가 전장에 들어올 때, 1/1 백색 생쥐 생물 토큰 두 개를 만든다.
탑승 2 (당신이 조종하는 생물을 공격력 총합이 2 이상이 되도록 원하는 수만큼 탭한다: 이 탑승물은 턴종료까지 마법물체 생물이 된다.)

foreignNames.name: Carruagem Encantada
foreignNames.text:
Quando Carruagem Encantada entrar no campo de batalha, crie duas fichas de criatura branca 1/1 do tipo Camundongo.
Tripular 2 (Vire qualquer número de criaturas que você controla com total de poder igual ou superior a 2: Este Veículo torna-se uma criatura artefato até o final do turno.)

foreignNames.name: Зачарованная Карета
foreignNames.text:
Когда Зачарованная Карета выходит на поле битвы, создайте две фишки существа 1/1 белая Мышь.
Экипаж 2 (Поверните любое количество существ под вашим контролем с суммарной силой 2 или более: эта Машина становится артефактом существом до конца хода.)

foreignNames.name: 魔法马车
foreignNames.text:
当魔法马车进战场时，派出两个1/1白色家鼠衍生生物。
搭载2（横置任意数量由你操控且力量总和等于或大于2的生物：此载具成为神器生物直到回合结束。）

foreignNames.name: 魔法馬車
foreignNames.text:
當魔法馬車進戰場時，派出兩個1/1白色家鼠衍生生物。
搭載2（橫置任意數量由你操控且力量總和等於或大於2的生物：此載具成為神器生物直到回合結束。）

originalText:
When Enchanted Carriage enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Mouse creature tokens.
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

name: Gingerbrute
text:
Haste
{1}: Gingerbrute can't be blocked this turn except by creatures with haste.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Gingerbrute: You gain 3 life.
flavor: The unlabeled vial was not vanilla extract after all.

rulings.text: Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures (such as Gingerbrute), it's never a creature type.
You can't sacrifice a Food token to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate the ability of Tempting Witch.
Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.
Activating Gingerbrute's middle ability after it has become blocked by a creature without haste won't cause it to become unblocked.
If an effect refers to a Food, it means any Food artifact, not just a Food artifact token. For example, you can sacrifice Gingerbrute to activate the last ability of Tempting Witch.

foreignNames.name: Lebkuchen-Rohling
foreignNames.text:
Eile
{1}: Der Lebkuchen-Rohling kann in diesem Zug außer von Kreaturen mit Eile nicht geblockt werden.
{2}, {T}, opfere den Lebkuchen-Rohling: Du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.
foreignNames.flavor: Die unbeschriftete Phiole enthielt scheinbar doch kein Vanilleextrakt.

foreignNames.name: Bruto de jengibre

rulings.text: If an effect refers to a Food, it means any Food artifact, not just a Food artifact token. For example, you can sacrifice Gingerbrute to activate the last ability of Tempting Witch.
Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures (such as Gingerbrute), it's never a creature type.
You can't sacrifice a Food token to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate the ability of Tempting Witch.
Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.

name: Henge Walker
text: Adamant — If at least three mana of the same color was spent to cast this spell, Henge Walker enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: Everything that inhabits Garenbrig is affected by the wild magic flowing through the Great Henge.

rulings.text: If an effect allows you to cast a spell without paying its mana cost, you can't choose to cast it and pay unless another rule or effect allows you to cast that spell for a cost. Similarly, you can't waive a cost reduction unless that effect says you may.

Adamant effects check what mana was actually spent to cast a spell. If an effect allows you to spend mana “as though it were mana” of any color or type, that allows you to spend mana you couldn't otherwise spend, but it doesn't change what mana you spent to cast the spell.
If you copy a spell that has an adamant ability, no mana was spent to cast the copy at all, so that ability won't apply.

name: Lucky Clover
text: Whenever you cast an Adventure instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor: Syr Branigan always remembered to kiss his good luck charm, having lost his foot to wolverines the last time he forgot.

rulings.text: If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it's not possible to cast the copy as a creature.
Lucky Clover can copy any Adventure spell, not just one with targets.
The copy is created on the stack, so it's not “cast.” Abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell won't trigger.

The copy will have the same targets as the spell it's copying unless you choose new ones. You may change any number of the targets, including all of them or none of them. If, for one of the targets, you can't choose a new legal target, then it remains unchanged (even if the current target is illegal).
Lucky Clover's ability and the copy it creates both resolve before the Adventure spell. They resolve even if the Adventure spell is countered before the copy is created.

foreignNames.name: 뜨거운 가마솥
foreignNames.text: {3}, {T}, 뜨거운 가마솥을 희생한다: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 뜨거운 가마솥은 그 생물에게 피해 3점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: "이 고통이 가득 찬 가마솥은 마녀의 술책이다. 나라면 사악한 자에게 이것을 쏟아 버리겠어."

foreignNames.name: Caldeirão Escaldante
foreignNames.text: {3}, {T}, sacrifique Caldeirão Escaldante: Ele causa 3 pontos de dano à criatura alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Esse caldeirão vai causar tanta dor que vai parecer bruxaria. Vamos jogá-lo apenas nos realmente malvados."

foreignNames.name: Обжигающий Котел
foreignNames.text: {3}, {T}, пожертвуйте Обжигающий Котел: он наносит 3 повреждения целевому существу.
foreignNames.flavor: «Ведьмины фокусы, котел, наполненный болью. Я не стану выливать его ни на кого, кроме отъявленных злодеев».

foreignNames.name: 沸腾鼎镬
foreignNames.text: {3}，{T}，牺牲沸腾鼎镬：它对目标生物造成3点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「这满满一鼎的痛苦都是女巫的杰作。我只会往邪恶的人身上浇。」

foreignNames.name: 沸騰鼎鑊
foreignNames.text: {3}，{T}，犧牲沸騰鼎鑊：它對目標生物造成3點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「這滿滿一鼎的痛苦都是女巫的傑作。我只會往邪惡的人身上澆。」

originalText: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Scalding Cauldron: It deals 3 damage to target creature.

name: Shambling Suit
text: Shambling Suit's power is equal to the number of artifacts and/or enchantments you control.
flavor:
"The young squire gripped her sword as the clanking stranger emerged. It was no knight that had come to challenge her."
—*Beyond the Great Henge*

rulings.text: The ability that defines Shambling Suit's power works in all zones, not just the battlefield.
As long as Shambling Suit is on the battlefield, its ability will count itself, so it'll be at least 1/3.
A permanent that's both an artifact and an enchantment is only counted once.

foreignNames.name: Trottende Rüstung
foreignNames.text: Die Stärke der Trottenden Rüstung ist gleich der Anzahl an Artefakten und/oder Verzauberungen, die du kontrollierst.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Die junge Junkerin ergriff ihr Schwert, als der scheppernde Fremde auftauchte. Es war kein Ritter, der gekommen war, um sie herauszufordern."
—*Jenseits des Großen Steinkreises*

foreignNames.name: Armadura en pedazos
foreignNames.text: La fuerza de la Armadura en pedazos es igual a la cantidad de artefactos y/o encantamientos que controlas.
foreignNames.flavor:
"La joven escudera empuñó con fuerza su espada en cuanto apareció el extraño chirriante, pero quien había venido a desafiarla no era ningún caballero".
—*Más allá del Gran Crómlech*

foreignNames.name: Armure titubante
foreignNames.text: La force de l'Armure titubante est égale au nombre d'artefacts et/ou d'enchantements que vous contrôlez.
foreignNames.flavor:
« La jeune écuyère agrippa son épée lorsque l'inconnu cliquetant émergea. Ce n'était pas un chevalier qui était venu la défier. »
—*Au-delà du Grand Cromlech*

foreignNames.name: Armatura Barcollante
foreignNames.text: La forza dell'Armatura Barcollante è pari al numero di artefatti e/o incantesimi che controlli.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Quando apparve lo sconosciuto sferragliante, la giovane scudiera strinse la sua spada. Non era un cavaliere quello che era venuto a sfidarla."
—*Oltre il Grande Monolito*

foreignNames.name: よろめく鎧
foreignNames.text: よろめく鎧のパワーは、あなたがコントロールしているアーティファクトやエンチャントの総数に等しい。
foreignNames.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — 構築物
foreignNames.flavor:
「金属の音を立てながら向かってくる者に、若い従者は剣を握りしめた。自分に向かってくる騎士など、これまでいなかった。」
――*グレートヘンジを超えて*

foreignNames.name: 꾸물거리는 옷
foreignNames.text: 꾸물거리는 옷의 공격력은 당신이 조종하는 마법물체 및/또는 부여마법의 수와 같다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"젊은 견습기사는 쩔그렁거리는 이방인이 나타나자 그녀의 검을 움켜쥐었다. 그녀에게 도전해온 것은 기사가 아니었다."
—*거대한 헨지 저편*

foreignNames.name: Armadura em Frangalhos
foreignNames.text: O poder de Armadura em Frangalhos é igual ao número de artefatos e/ou encantamentos que você controla.
foreignNames.flavor:
"A jovem escudeira segurou a espada quando o estranho surgiu retinindo. Não era um cavaleiro que viera desafiá-la."
— *Além do Grande Círculo*

foreignNames.name: Доспех-Шатун
foreignNames.text: Сила Доспеха-Шатуна равна количеству артефактов и (или) чар под вашим контролем.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Молодая оруженосица крепче сжала меч, когда разглядела лязгающего незнакомца. Вовсе не рыцарь явился, чтобы бросить ей вызов».
— *«За Великим Кромлехом»*

foreignNames.name: 跛行铠甲
foreignNames.text: 跛行铠甲的力量等同于由你操控之神器和／或结界的总数量。
foreignNames.flavor:
「咔嚓作响的陌生人忽然出现，年轻的扈从握紧利剑。前来挑战她的根本就不是骑士。」
～*《圆石阵奇谭》*

foreignNames.name: 跛行鎧甲
foreignNames.text: 跛行鎧甲的力量等同於由你操控之神器和／或結界的總數量。
foreignNames.flavor:
「卡嚓作響的陌生人忽然出現，年輕的扈從握緊利劍。前來挑戰她的根本就不是騎士。」
～*《圓石陣奇譚》*

originalText: Shambling Suit's power is equal to the number of artifacts and/or enchantments you control.

name: Signpost Scarecrow
text:
Vigilance
{2}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor:
"Accursed scarecrow! Sending folk in every direction is the same as sending them nowhere at all."
—Corliss the Wanderer

foreignNames.name: Wegweiser-Scheuche
foreignNames.text:
Wachsamkeit
{2}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Verfluchte Vogelscheuche! Reisende in alle möglichen Richtungen zu schicken ist dasselbe, wie sie nirgendwo hinzuschicken."
—Corliss der Reisende

foreignNames.name: Espantapájaros indicador
foreignNames.text:
Vigilancia.
{2}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color.
foreignNames.flavor:
"¡Maldito espantapájaros! Enviar a la gente en todas las direcciones es lo mismo que no enviarla a ninguna parte".
—Corliss, el Viajero

foreignNames.name: Épouvantail indicateur
foreignNames.text:
Vigilance
{2} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Maudit épouvantail ! Expédier les gens dans toutes les directions revient à ne les envoyer nulle part. »
—Corliss le vagabond

foreignNames.name: Spaventapasseri dei Segnali
foreignNames.text:
Cautela
{2}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Maledetto spaventapasseri! Mandare la gente in tutte le direzioni è come non mandarla da nessuna parte."
—Corliss il Viandante

foreignNames.name: 道標のカカシ
foreignNames.text:
警戒
{2}：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。
foreignNames.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — カカシ
foreignNames.flavor:
「忌々しいカカシめ！人をあらゆる方向へ導くのはどこにも導いていないのと同じだ！」
――放浪者コーリス

foreignNames.name: 이정표 허수아비
foreignNames.text:
경계
{2}: 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 추가한다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"저주받은 허수아비 같으니! 사방팔방으로 사람들을 보내는 것은 아무 데로도 보내지 않는 것과 마찬가지야."
—방랑자 코를리스

foreignNames.name: Espantalho Sinalizador
foreignNames.text:
Vigilância
{2}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Espantalho maldito! Mandar as pessoas pra todo lado é o mesmo que não dar direção nenhuma!"
— Corliss, o Errante

foreignNames.name: Указательное Пугало
foreignNames.text:
Бдительность
{2}: добавьте одну ману любого цвета.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Проклятое пугало! Показывать людям все направления сразу — это все равно, что не показывать никакого».
— Корлисс Странник

foreignNames.name: 路标稻草人
foreignNames.text:
警戒
{2}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。
foreignNames.flavor:
「该死的稻草人！给人乱指路就和没指路一样。」
～云游者柯力斯

foreignNames.name: 路標稻草人
foreignNames.text:
警戒
{2}：加一點任意顏色的魔法力。
foreignNames.flavor:
「該死的稻草人！給人亂指路就和沒指路一樣。」
～雲遊者柯力斯

originalText:
Vigilance
{2}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Sorcerer's Broom
text: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, you may pay {3}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of Sorcerer's Broom.
flavor:
"Reynald wished for an army to sweep away his enemies. The fae king smiled."
—*Beyond the Great Henge*

rulings.text: The ability of Sorcerer's Broom is a triggered ability, not an activated ability. It doesn't allow you to sacrifice a permanent whenever you want; rather, you need some other way of sacrificing permanents, such as the activated ability of Food tokens.
If you sacrifice Sorcerer's Broom and another permanent at the same time, Sorcerer's Broom's ability triggers for that permanent.

While resolving the triggered ability of Sorcerer's Broom, you can't pay {3} multiple times to create more than one token. However, if you control more than one Sorcerer's Broom, you can pay {3} for each of their abilities.
The token will have Sorcerer's Broom's ability. It will also be able to create copies of itself.

The token won't copy counters, Auras, or Equipment on Sorcerer's Broom, nor will it copy other effects that have changed Sorcerer's Broom's power, toughness, types, color, and so on. Normally, this means the token will simply be a Sorcerer's Broom, but if any copy effects have affected that Sorcerer's Broom, they're taken into account.

If Sorcerer's Broom leaves the battlefield before its triggered ability resolves, the token will still enter the battlefield as a copy of Sorcerer's Broom, using Sorcerer's Broom's copiable values from when it was last on the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: Besen des Hexenmeisters
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn du eine andere bleibende Karte opferst, kannst du {3} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, erzeuge einen Spielstein, der eine Kopie des Besens des Hexenmeisters ist.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Reynald wünschte sich eine Armee, um seine Feinde hinwegzufegen. Der Feenkönig lächelte."
—*Jenseits des Großen Steinkreises*

foreignNames.name: Escobas del brujo
foreignNames.text: Siempre que sacrifiques otro permanente, puedes pagar {3}. Si lo haces, crea una ficha que es una copia de las Escobas del brujo.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Reynald deseaba un ejército con el que barrer a sus enemigos. El rey de las hadas sonrió".
—*Más allá del Gran Crómlech*

foreignNames.name: Balai de sorcier
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que vous sacrifiez un autre permanent, vous pouvez payer {3}. Si vous faites ainsi, créez un jeton qui est une copie du Balai de sorcier.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Reynald souhaita avoir une armée capable de balayer ses ennemis. Le roi des fæs esquissa un sourire. »
—*Au-delà du Grand Cromlech*

foreignNames.name: Scopa dello Stregone
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta sacrifichi un altro permanente, puoi pagare {3}. Se lo fai, crea una pedina che è una copia della Scopa dello Stregone.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Reynald desiderò un esercito con cui spazzare via i suoi nemici. Il re delle fate sorrise."
—*Oltre il Grande Monolito*

foreignNames.name: 呪術師のほうき
foreignNames.text: あなたが他のパーマネントを１つ生け贄に捧げるたび、あなたは{3}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、呪術師のほうきのコピーであるトークンを１体生成する。
foreignNames.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — スピリット
foreignNames.flavor:
「レイナルドは敵を一掃する軍隊が欲しいと言った。フェイの王は笑みを浮かべた。」
――*グレートヘンジを超えて*

foreignNames.name: 마법사의 빗자루
foreignNames.text: 당신이 다른 지속물을 희생할 때마다, 당신은 {3}을 지불할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 마법사의 빗자루의 복사본인 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"레이날드는 그의 적들을 쓸어 없앨 수 있는 군대를 바랬다. 요정 왕은 미소지었다."
—*거대한 헨지 저편*

foreignNames.name: Vassoura do Feiticeiro
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que sacrifica outra permanente, você pode pagar {3}. Se fizer isso, crie uma ficha que seja uma cópia de Vassoura do Feiticeiro.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Reynald desejava um exército para varrer seus inimigos. O rei das fadinas sorriu."
— *Além do Grande Círculo*

foreignNames.name: Метла Колдуна
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда вы жертвуете другой перманент, вы можете заплатить {3}. Если вы это делаете, создайте одну фишку, являющуюся копией Метлы Колдуна.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Рейнальд пожелал получить армию, которая сметет его врагов. Король фей улыбнулся».
— *«За Великим Кромлехом»*

foreignNames.name: 术士扫帚
foreignNames.text: 每当你牺牲另一个永久物时，你可以支付{3}。若你如此作，则派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为术士扫帚的复制品。
foreignNames.flavor:
「雷纳德许愿要一支军队，好帮他扫清敌人。仙儿国王微微一笑。」
～*《圆石阵奇谭》*

foreignNames.name: 術士掃帚
foreignNames.text: 每當你犧牲另一個永久物時，你可以支付{3}。若你如此作，則派出一個衍生物，此衍生物為術士掃帚的複製品。
foreignNames.flavor:
「雷納德許願要一支軍隊，好幫他掃清敵人。仙兒國王微微一笑。」
～*《圓石陣奇譚》*

originalText: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, you may pay {3}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of Sorcerer's Broom.

name: Sorcerous Spyglass
text:
As Sorcerous Spyglass enters the battlefield, look at an opponent's hand, then choose any card name.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

rulings.text: You can choose any card name, even if that card doesn't normally have an activated ability. You're not limited to the names of cards you saw in the opponent's hand.
You can't choose the name of a token unless that token has the same name as a card.

Activated abilities contain a colon. They're generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keyword abilities (such as equip) are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text. Triggered abilities (starting with “when,” “whenever,” or “at”) are unaffected by the last ability of Sorcerous Spyglass.
An activated mana ability is one that produces mana as it resolves, not one that costs mana to activate.
Sorcerous Spyglass affects cards regardless of what zone they're in. This includes cards in hand, cards in the graveyard, and exiled cards.

foreignNames.name: Magisches Fernrohr
foreignNames.text:
Sowie das Magische Fernrohr ins Spiel kommt, schaue dir die Karten auf der Hand eines Gegners an und bestimme dann einen beliebigen Kartennamen.
Aktivierte Fähigkeiten von Quellen mit dem bestimmten Namen können nicht aktiviert werden, es sei denn, es sind Manafähigkeiten.

foreignNames.name: Catalejo hechizado
foreignNames.text:
En cuanto el Catalejo hechizado entre al campo de batalla, mira la mano de un oponente y luego elige cualquier nombre de carta.
Las habilidades activadas de las fuentes con el nombre elegido no pueden activarse a menos que sean habilidades de maná.

foreignNames.name: Longue-vue ensorceleuse
foreignNames.text:
Au moment où la Longue-vue ensorceleuse arrive sur le champ de bataille, regardez la main d'un adversaire, puis choisissez n'importe quel nom de carte.
Les capacités activées des sources du nom choisi ne peuvent pas être activées à moins qu'elles ne soient des capacités de mana.

foreignNames.name: Cannocchiale Incantato
foreignNames.text:
Mentre il Cannocchiale Incantato entra nel campo di battaglia, guarda la mano di un avversario, poi scegli il nome di una carta qualsiasi.
Le abilità attivate delle fonti col nome scelto non possono essere attivate a meno che non siano abilità di mana.

foreignNames.name: 魔術遠眼鏡
foreignNames.text:
魔術遠眼鏡が戦場に出るに際し、対戦相手１人の手札を見て、その後任意のカード名１つを選ぶ。
その選ばれた名前を持つ発生源の起動型能力は、それがマナ能力でないかぎり起動できない。

foreignNames.name: 마법의 망원경
foreignNames.text:
마법의 망원경이 전장에 들어오면서, 상대의 손을 본 후, 아무 카드 이름을 선택한다.
선택한 이름을 가진 원천의 활성화능력은 마나 능력이 아닌 한 활성화될 수 없다.

foreignNames.name: Luneta Enfeitiçada
foreignNames.text:
Conforme Luneta Enfeitiçada entrar no campo de batalha, olhe a mão de um oponente e depois escolha qualquer nome de card.
As habilidades ativadas de fontes com o nome escolhido não podem ser ativadas, a menos que sejam habilidades de mana.

foreignNames.name: Волшебная Подзорная Труба
foreignNames.text:
При выходе Волшебной Подзорной Трубы на поле битвы посмотрите руку оппонента, затем выберите любое имя карты.
Активируемые способности источников с выбранным именем не могут быть активированы, если только они не являются мана-способностями.

foreignNames.name: 巫视望远镜
foreignNames.text:
于巫视望远镜进战场时，检视任一对手的手牌，然后任意选择一个牌名。
除了法术力异能之外，具有该名称之来源的起动式异能都不能起动。

foreignNames.name: 巫視望遠鏡
foreignNames.text:
於巫視望遠鏡進戰場時，檢視任一對手的手牌，然後任意選擇一個牌名。
除了魔法力異能之外，具有該名稱之來源的起動式異能都不能起動。

originalText:
As Sorcerous Spyglass enters the battlefield, look at an opponent's hand, then choose any card name.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

name: Spinning Wheel
text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{5}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor:
"Though long forgotten, the wheel continued to turn, spinning fate from a dusty attic."
—*Beyond the Great Henge*

foreignNames.name: Spinnrad
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.
{5}, {T}: Tappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Obwohl es längst vergessen war, drehte sich das Rad weiter und spann auf einem staubigen Dachboden das Schicksal."

foreignNames.name: Rueca

{5}, {T}: Gira la criatura objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor:

foreignNames.name: Rouet

{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix.
{5}, {T} : Engagez la créature ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Bien qu'oublié depuis longtemps, le rouet continuait de tourner, filant le destin dans un grenier poussiéreux. »
—*Au-delà du Grand Cromlech*

foreignNames.name: Filatoio
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore.
{5}, {T}: TAPpa una creatura bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Sebbene dimenticato da tempo, il filatoio continuava a girare, tessendo il destino da una soffitta polverosa."
—*Oltre il Grande Monolito*

foreignNames.name: 糸車
foreignNames.text:
{T}：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。
{5}, {T}：クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをタップする。
foreignNames.flavor:
「もう誰も覚えていなかったが、その糸車はずっと回り続け、煤けた屋根裏から運命を紡いでいた。」
――*グレートヘンジを超えて*

foreignNames.name: 물레
foreignNames.text:
{T}: 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 추가한다.

name: Weapon Rack
text:
Weapon Rack enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
{T}: Move a +1/+1 counter from Weapon Rack onto target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor: No weapon stays on the rack for long in the Burning Yard.

rulings.text: The +1/+1 counters on Weapon Rack won't affect it unless it somehow becomes a creature.
Once Weapon Rack runs out of +1/+1 counters, it remains on the battlefield. You can activate its last ability, but it won't do anything.

If Weapon Rack has left the battlefield or has no +1/+1 counters on it by the time its activated ability resolves, you won't put a +1/+1 counter on the target creature. If the creature becomes an illegal target or can't have a +1/+1 counter put onto it for some other reason, you won't remove a +1/+1 counter from Weapon Rack.

name: Witch's Oven
text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Create a Food token. If the sacrificed creature's toughness was 4 or greater, create two Food tokens instead. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
flavor: The wafting smells are both scrumptious and suspicious.

rulings.text: You can't sacrifice a Food token to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate the ability of Tempting Witch.
Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.

No player may take actions between the time you announce you're activating Witch's Oven's ability and the time you sacrifice a creature. Notably, they can't try to remove or shrink the creature you'd like to bake.
Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures (such as Gingerbrute), it's never a creature type.

name: Gingerbread Cabin
text:
({T}: Add {G}.)
Gingerbread Cabin enters the battlefield tapped unless you control three or more other Forests.
When Gingerbread Cabin enters the battlefield untapped, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

rulings.text: Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures (such as Gingerbrute), it's never a creature type.
You can't sacrifice a Food token to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate the ability of Tempting Witch.
Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.

As these lands are entering the battlefield, they check for lands that are already on the battlefield. They won't see lands that are entering the battlefield at the same time (due to Scapeshift, for example).
If another effect puts these lands onto the battlefield tapped, they enter tapped, even if you control enough lands with the appropriate basic land type.

{T}: {R}, {W}, 또는 {B}를 추가한다. 이 마나는 기사 또는 장비 주문을 발동하는 데에만 사용할 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: 아무도 언제 시합이 시작되었는지 모른다. 그들이 아는 것은 시합이 절대 끝나지 않으리라는 것이다.

foreignNames.name: Campo de Torneios
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{T}: Adicione {R}, {W} ou {B}. Gaste este mana apenas para conjurar uma mágica de Cavaleiro ou Equipamento.
foreignNames.flavor: Ninguém sabe quando o torneio começou. Tudo que se sabe é que ele jamais terminará.

foreignNames.name: Ристалище
foreignNames.text:
{T}: добавьте {C}.
{T}: добавьте {R}, {W} или {B}. Тратьте эту ману только на разыгрывание заклинания Рыцаря или Снаряжения.
foreignNames.flavor: Никто не знает, когда начался турнир. Все знают лишь то, что он никогда не закончится.

foreignNames.name: 竞技赛场
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{T}：加{R}，{W}或{B}。此法术力只能用来施放骑士或武具咒语。
foreignNames.flavor: 谁都不知道竞技何时开始。他们只知道竞技永不结束。

foreignNames.name: 競技賽場
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{T}：加{R}，{W}或{B}。此魔法力只能用來施放騎士或武具咒語。
foreignNames.flavor: 誰都不知道競技何時開始。他們只知道競技永不結束。

originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}. Spend this mana only to cast a Knight or Equipment spell.

name: Witch's Cottage
text:
({T}: Add {B}.)
Witch's Cottage enters the battlefield tapped unless you control three or more other Swamps.
When Witch's Cottage enters the battlefield untapped, you may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

rulings.text: As these lands are entering the battlefield, they check for lands that are already on the battlefield. They won't see lands that are entering the battlefield at the same time (due to Scapeshift, for example).
If another effect puts these lands onto the battlefield tapped, they enter tapped, even if you control enough lands with the appropriate basic land type.

foreignNames.name: Hexenhaus
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {B}.)
Das Hexenhaus kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst drei oder mehr andere Sümpfe.
Wenn das Hexenhaus ungetappt ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof oben auf deine Bibliothek legen.

foreignNames.name: Cabaña de la bruja
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Agrega {B}.)
La Cabaña de la bruja entra al campo de batalla girada a menos que controles otros tres o más Pantanos.
Cuando la Cabaña de la bruja entre al campo de batalla enderezada, puedes poner la carta de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio en la parte superior de tu biblioteca.

foreignNames.name: Maison de l'envoûteuse
foreignNames.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {B}.)
La Maison de l'envoûteuse arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée à moins que vous ne contrôliez au moins trois autres marais.
Quand la Maison de l'envoûteuse arrive sur le champ de bataille dégagée, vous pouvez mettre une carte de créature ciblée depuis votre cimetière au-dessus de votre bibliothèque.

foreignNames.name: Capanna della Strega
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {B}.)
La Capanna della Strega entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata a meno che tu non controlli tre o più altre Paludi.
Quando la Capanna della Strega entra nel campo di battaglia STAPpata, puoi mettere una carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero in cima al tuo grimorio.

foreignNames.name: 魔女の小屋
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：{B}を加える。）
あなたが他の沼を３つ以上コントロールしているのでないかぎり、魔女の小屋はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
魔女の小屋がアンタップ状態で戦場に出たとき、あなたの墓地からクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。あなたはそれをあなたのライブラリーの一番上に置いてもよい。

foreignNames.name: 마녀의 오두막집
foreignNames.text:
({T}: {B}를 추가한다.)
당신이 다른 늪을 세 개 이상 조종하지 않는 한 마녀의 오두막집은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
마녀의 오두막집이 언탭되어 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드를 목표로 정한다. 당신은 그 카드를 당신의 서고 맨 위에 놓을 수 있다.

foreignNames.name: Casebre da Bruxa
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Adicione {B}.)
Casebre da Bruxa entra no campo de batalha virado, a menos que você controle três ou mais outros Pântanos.
Quando Casebre da Bruxa entra no campo de batalha desvirado, você pode colocar o card de criatura alvo de seu cemitério no topo de seu grimório.

foreignNames.name: Ведьмина Избушка
foreignNames.text:
({T}: добавьте {B}.)
Ведьмина Избушка выходит на поле битвы повернутой, если под вашим контролем менее трех других Болот.
Когда Ведьмина Избушка выходит на поле битвы развернутой, вы можете положить целевую карту существа из вашего кладбища на верх вашей библиотеки.

foreignNames.name: 巫婆小屋
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：加{B}。）
除非你操控三个或更多其他沼泽，否则巫婆小屋须横置进战场。
当巫婆小屋进战场且未横置时，你可以将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。

foreignNames.name: 巫婆小屋
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：加{B}。）
除非你操控三個或更多其他沼澤，否則巫婆小屋須橫置進戰場。
當巫婆小屋進戰場且未橫置時，你可以將目標生物牌從你的墳墓場置於你的牌庫頂。

name: Festive Funeral
text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.
flavor:
"Even as we mourn the last, we look to the next with joy. Hopefully, my new suitor will bring the Cauldron home."
—Ayara, First of Locthwain

rulings.text: The value of X is determined only as Festive Funeral begins to resolve. The target creature's power and toughness won't change if other cards are put into your graveyard later in the turn.
Festive Funeral is still on the stack while you determine the value of X. It doesn't contribute to the value of X.

foreignNames.name: Feierliches Begräbnis
foreignNames.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält bis zum Ende des Zuges -X/-X, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Karten in deinem Friedhof ist.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Noch während wir um den letzten trauern, blicken wir mit Freude auf den nächsten. Mein neuer Freier wird hoffentlich den Kessel zurückbringen."
—Ayara, Herrscherin von Locthwain

foreignNames.name: Funeral festivo
foreignNames.text: La criatura objetivo obtiene -X/-X hasta el final del turno, donde X es la cantidad de cartas en tu cementerio.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Aunque todavía estamos de luto por el último, el próximo nos inspira regocijo. Con suerte, mi nuevo pretendiente nos traerá de vuelta el Caldero".
—Ayara, la Primera de Nimboscuro

foreignNames.name: Funérailles festives
foreignNames.text: La créature ciblée gagne -X/-X jusqu'à la fin du tour, X étant le nombre de cartes dans votre cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Tandis que nous pleurons le précédent, nous nous tournons vers le suivant avec joie. Avec un peu de chance, mon nouveau prétendant ramènera le Chaudron. »
—Ayara, Première de Locthwain

foreignNames.name: Funerale Festoso
foreignNames.text: Una creatura bersaglio prende -X/-X fino alla fine del turno, dove X è il numero di carte nel tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Mentre piangiamo ancora l'ultimo, guardiamo con gioia al prossimo. Mi auguro che il mio nuovo pretendente riesca a riportare a casa il Calderone."
—Ayara, Prima di Loctevenna

foreignNames.name: 華やかな葬送
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは－Ｘ/－Ｘの修整を受ける。Ｘはあなたの墓地にあるカードの枚数に等しい。
foreignNames.flavor:
「前の者を嘆きながらも、我々は喜んで次の者に目を向ける。次の求婚者こそ、大釜を持ち帰ってくれることを期待して。」
――ロークスワインの元首、アヤーラ

foreignNames.name: 축제 같은 장례
foreignNames.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 -X/-X를 받는다. X는 당신의 무덤에 있는 카드 수이다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"스러진 자들을 애통해하면서도, 우리는 다음 사람들을 기쁨으로 쳐다본다. 어쩌면, 내 새로운 구혼자가 가마솥을 가지고 돌아오리라."
—로크트웨인의 일인자, 아야라

foreignNames.name: Funeral Festivo
foreignNames.text: A criatura alvo recebe -X/-X até o final do turno, sendo X o número de cards em seu cemitério.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Enquanto lamentamos a perda do último, olhamos para o próximo com júbilo . Tenho esperanças de que meu novo pretendente trará o Caldeirão de volta para casa."
— Ayara, Primeira de Locthwain

foreignNames.name: Торжественные Похороны
foreignNames.text: Целевое существо получает -X/-X до конца хода, где Х — количество карт на вашем кладбище.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Мы скорбим о предыдущем, но на нынешнего смотрим с радостью. Я надеюсь, что мой новый жених вернет Котел домой».
— Айара, Первая в Локтвейне

foreignNames.name: 葬仪庆典
foreignNames.text: 目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为你坟墓场中牌的数量。
foreignNames.flavor:
「我们要为前任致哀，更要为后任贺喜。希望我的继任准夫婿能把鼎镬安全带回。」
～洛司温首领阿娅拉

foreignNames.name: 葬儀慶典
foreignNames.text: 目標生物得-X/-X直到回合結束，X為你墳墓場中牌的數量。
foreignNames.flavor:
「我們要為前任致哀，更要為後任賀喜。希望我的繼任準夫婿能把鼎鑊安全帶回。」
～洛司溫首領阿婭拉

originalText: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.

name: Foreboding Fruit
text:
Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
Adamant — If at least three black mana was spent to cast this spell, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

rulings.text: If at least three black mana was spent to cast Foreboding Fruit, you'll create a Food, even if you have another player draw two cards and lose 2 life.

If an instant or sorcery spell has an adamant ability, you perform the spell's instructions in order. You don't perform the adamant instruction before the spell resolves or before any other effects printed above it.

If an effect allows you to cast a spell without paying its mana cost, you can't choose to cast it and pay unless another rule or effect allows you to cast that spell for a cost. Similarly, you can't waive a cost reduction unless that effect says you may.

Adamant effects check what mana was actually spent to cast a spell. If an effect allows you to spend mana “as though it were mana” of any color or type, that allows you to spend mana you couldn't otherwise spend, but it doesn't change what mana you spent to cast the spell.
If you copy a spell that has an adamant ability, no mana was spent to cast the copy at all, so that ability won't apply.

Some spells that instruct you to create a Food token have targets. You can't cast these spells without choosing all required targets, and if all of those targets become illegal targets, the spell won't resolve and you won't create any Food. If some but not all of those targets become illegal, you'll do as much as possible, including creating Food.
Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures (such as Gingerbrute), it's never a creature type.
You can't sacrifice a Food token to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate the ability of Tempting Witch.
Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.

foreignNames.name: Unheilvolle Frucht
foreignNames.text:
Ein Spieler deiner Wahl zieht zwei Karten und verliert 2 Lebenspunkte.
Adamant — Falls drei oder mehr schwarze Mana ausgegeben wurden, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, erzeuge einen Speise-Spielstein. (Er ist ein Artefakt mit „{2}, {T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.")

foreignNames.name: Fruto del mal presentimiento
foreignNames.text:
El jugador objetivo roba dos cartas y pierde 2 vidas.
Tesón — Si se usaron al menos tres manás negros para lanzar este hechizo, crea una ficha de Comida. (Es un artefacto con "{2}, {T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Ganas 3 vidas".)

foreignNames.name: Fruit angoissant
foreignNames.text:
Le joueur ciblé pioche deux cartes et perd 2 points de vie.
Inflexible — Si au moins trois manas noirs ont été dépensés pour lancer ce sort, créez un jeton Nourriture. (C'est un artefact avec « {2}, {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Vous gagnez 3 points de vie. »)

foreignNames.name: Frutto del Presagio
foreignNames.text:
Un giocatore bersaglio pesca due carte e perde 2 punti vita.
Adamantino — Se sono stati spesi almeno tre mana neri per lanciare questa magia, crea una pedina Cibo. (È un artefatto con "{2}, {T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Guadagni 3 punti vita".)

foreignNames.name: 凶兆の果実
foreignNames.text:
プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカードを２枚引き２点のライフを失う。
一徹 ― この呪文を唱えるために黒マナが３点以上支払われていたなら、食物・トークンを１つ生成する。（それは、「{2}, {T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：あなたは３点のライフを得る。」を持つアーティファクトである。）

foreignNames.name: 불길한 과일
foreignNames.text:
플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 카드 두 장을 뽑고 생명 2점을 잃는다.
단호 — 이 주문을 발동하는 데 적어도 흑색 마나 세 개가 지불되었다면, 음식 토큰 한 개를 만든다. (음식 토큰은 "{2}, {T}, 이 마법물체를 희생한다: 당신은 생명 3점을 얻는다."를 가진 마법물체이다.)

foreignNames.name: Fruta Agourenta
foreignNames.text:
O jogador alvo compra dois cards e perde 2 pontos de vida.
Obstinação — Se ao menos três manas pretos tiverem sido gastos para conjurar esta mágica, crie uma ficha de Comida. (Ela é um artefato com "{2}, {T}, sacrifique este artefato: Você ganha 3 pontos de vida.")

foreignNames.name: Зловещий Плод
foreignNames.text:
Целевой игрок берет две карты и теряет 2 жизни.
Твердость — Если на разыгрывание этого заклинания было потрачено три или больше черной маны, создайте одну фишку Еды. (Она является артефактом со способностью «{2}, {T}, пожертвуйте этот артефакт: вы получаете 3 жизни».)

foreignNames.name: 预兆果实
foreignNames.text:
目标牌手抓两张牌且失去2点生命。
固色～如果施放此咒语时支付过至少三点黑色法术力，则派出一个食品衍生物。（食品衍生物是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。）

foreignNames.name: 預兆果實
foreignNames.text:
目標玩家抽兩張牌且失去2點生命。
固色～如果施放此咒語時支付過至少三點黑色魔法力，則派出一個食品衍生物。（食品衍生物是具有「{2}，{T}，犧牲此神器：你獲得3點生命」的神器。）

originalText:
Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
Adamant — If at least three black mana was spent to cast this spell, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

name: Forever Young
text:
Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card.
flavor: Those who say you only live once have never been touched by the Cauldron of Eternity.

rulings.text: If you choose any target creature cards and they are all illegal targets by the time Forever Young tries to resolve, the spell won't resolve. You won't draw a card.
You choose the order that the creature cards are put on top of your library. You don't have to reveal this order to other players. Whichever ends up on top will be the card you draw.
You can cast Forever Young with no targets if you just want to draw a card.

foreignNames.name: Ewige Jugend
foreignNames.text:
Lege eine beliebige Anzahl an Kreaturenkarten deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof oben auf deine Bibliothek.
Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: Wer sagt, man lebt nur einmal, wurde noch nie vom Kessel der Ewigkeit berührt.

foreignNames.name: Juventud eterna
foreignNames.text:
Pon cualquier cantidad de cartas de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio en la parte superior de tu biblioteca.
Roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Quienes dicen que solo se vive una vez no se acercaron nunca al Caldero de la Eternidad.

foreignNames.name: Jeunesse éternelle
foreignNames.text:
Mettez n'importe quel nombre de cartes de créature ciblées depuis votre cimetière au-dessus de votre bibliothèque.
Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Ceux qui racontent qu'on ne vit qu'une fois n'ont jamais été bénis par le Chaudron d'Éternité.

foreignNames.name: Per Sempre Giovane
foreignNames.text:
Metti in cima al tuo grimorio un qualsiasi numero di carte creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.
Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Chi dice che si vive una volta sola non è mai stato toccato dal Calderone dell'Eternità.

foreignNames.name: 永遠の若さ
foreignNames.text:
あなたの墓地から望む枚数のクリーチャー・カードを対象とし、それらをあなたのライブラリーの一番上に置く。
カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 人生一度きりなどと言う者は、永遠の大釜に触れたことがないのだ。

foreignNames.name: 영원한 젊음
foreignNames.text:
당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드를 원하는 만큼 목표로 정한다. 그 카드들을 당신의 서고 맨 위에 올려놓는다.
카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 인생은 한 번만 사는 것이라는 말을 하는 자들은 영원의 가마솥을 마주한 적이 없는 것이다.

foreignNames.name: Jovem para Sempre
foreignNames.text:
Coloque qualquer número de cards de criatura alvo de seu cemitério no topo de seu grimório.
Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: Os que dizem que só se vive uma vez jamais foram tocados pelo Caldeirão da Eternidade.

foreignNames.name: Вечная Молодость
foreignNames.text:
Положите любое количество целевых карт существ из вашего кладбища на верх вашей библиотеки.
Возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Тех, кто говорит, будто мы живем всего лишь один раз, просто никогда не касался Котел Вечности.

foreignNames.name: 青春永驻
foreignNames.text:
将任意数量的目标生物牌从你的坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。
抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 那些口口声声说生命只有一次的人，从未领受过永恒鼎镬的神奇。

foreignNames.name: 青春永駐
foreignNames.text:
將任意數量的目標生物牌從你的墳墓場置於你的牌庫頂。
抽一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 那些口口聲聲說生命只有一次的人，從未領受過永恆鼎鑊的神奇。

originalText:
Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card.

name: Foulmire Knight // Profane Insight
text: Deathtouch

rulings.text: An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it's in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose mana value is 1. It can't be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card's normal characteristics. The spell's color, mana cost, mana value, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it's legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can't cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won't be exiled and the spell's controller won't be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won't give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.
You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you'll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it's not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it's a token) or cease to be a copy (if it's a nontoken permanent), and so you won't be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn't casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.

rulings.text: An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it's in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose mana value is 1. It can't be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card's normal characteristics. The spell's color, mana cost, mana value, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it's legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can't cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won't be exiled and the spell's controller won't be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won't give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.
You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you'll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it's not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it's a token) or cease to be a copy (if it's a nontoken permanent), and so you won't be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn't casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.

rulings.text: The triggered ability of Giant's Skewer triggers even if the equipped creature died, and even if the creature that was dealt damage didn't die.
Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures (such as Gingerbrute), it's never a creature type.
