rulings.text: If an effect allows you to cast a spell without paying its mana cost, you can't choose to cast it and pay unless another rule or effect allows you to cast that spell for a cost. Similarly, you can't waive a cost reduction unless that effect says you may.

Adamant effects check what mana was actually spent to cast a spell. If an effect allows you to spend mana “as though it were mana” of any color or type, that allows you to spend mana you couldn't otherwise spend, but it doesn't change what mana you spent to cast the spell.
If you copy a spell that has an adamant ability, no mana was spent to cast the copy at all, so that ability won't apply.

name: Memory Theft
text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You may put a card that has an Adventure that player owns from exile into that player's graveyard.
flavor: In the wilds, the ravens steal far more than baubles.

rulings.text: You choose which exiled adventurer card, if any, to put into that player's graveyard after seeing their hand. You may do this even if that player has no nonland cards in hand, or even no cards at all.
Memory Theft allows you to put any face-up exiled card with an Adventure that player owns into their graveyard, not just one that was cast as an Adventure and exiled.

An effect may refer to a card, spell, or permanent that “has an Adventure.” This refers to a card, spell, or permanent that has an adventurer card's set of alternative characteristics, even if they're not being used and even if that card was never cast as an Adventure.
If an effect refers to a creature card, creature spell, or creature that has an Adventure, it won't find an instant or sorcery spell on the stack that's been cast as an Adventure.

foreignNames.name: Gedankenraub
foreignNames.text: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Du bestimmst davon eine Nichtland-Karte. Der Spieler wirft die bestimmte Karte ab. Du kannst eine Karte mit einem Abenteuer, die der Spieler besitzt, aus dem Exil auf den Friedhof des Spielers legen.
foreignNames.flavor: In der Wildnis stehlen die Raben weit mehr als nur Tand.

foreignNames.name: Robo de recuerdos
foreignNames.text: El oponente objetivo muestra su mano. Tú eliges de ahí una carta que no sea tierra. Ese jugador descarta esa carta. Puedes poner en el cementerio de ese jugador desde el exilio una carta de la cual ese jugador sea propietario que tenga una Aventura.
foreignNames.flavor: En las tierras salvajes, los cuervos no solo roban baratijas.

foreignNames.name: Vol de mémoire
foreignNames.text: L'adversaire ciblé révèle sa main. Vous y choisissez une carte non-terrain. Ce joueur se défausse de cette carte. Vous pouvez mettre, depuis l'exil, une carte avec une aventure que ce joueur possède dans le cimetière de ce joueur.
foreignNames.flavor: Dans les friches, les corbeaux ne volent pas que des babioles.

foreignNames.name: Sottrazione di Memoria
foreignNames.text: Un avversario bersaglio rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta non terra da quella mano. Quel giocatore scarta quella carta. Puoi mettere una carta che ha un'Avventura e di cui quel giocatore è proprietario dall'esilio nel cimitero di quel giocatore.
foreignNames.flavor: Nelle terre selvagge, i corvi rubano molto più che gingilli.

foreignNames.name: 記憶盗み
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札を公開する。あなたはその中から土地でないカード１枚を選ぶ。そのプレイヤーはそのカードを捨てる。あなたは、追放領域からそのプレイヤーがオーナーであり出来事を持つカード１枚を、そのプレイヤーの墓地に置いてもよい。
foreignNames.flavor: 僻境では、カラスが盗むのはつまらない物ではない。

foreignNames.name: 기억 도둑
foreignNames.text: 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 손을 공개한다. 그중 대지가 아닌 카드 한 장을 선택한다. 그 플레이어는 그 카드를 버린다. 당신은 추방 영역에서 그 플레이어가 소유한 모험을 가진 카드 한 장을 그 플레이어의 무덤에 넣을 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: 야생지에서, 까마귀들은 그냥 반짝이는 것들보다 더 많은 것들을 훔친다.

foreignNames.name: Roubo de Memória
foreignNames.text: O oponente alvo revela a própria mão. Você escolhe um card que não seja um terreno da mão dele. Aquele jogador descarta aquele card. Você pode colocar no cemitério daquele jogador do exílio um card que aquele jogador possua com uma Aventura.
foreignNames.flavor: Nas terras selvagens, os corvos roubam muito mais do que bugigangas.

foreignNames.name: Кража Воспоминаний
foreignNames.text: Целевой оппонент показывает свою руку. Вы выбираете из нее карту, не являющуюся землей. Тот игрок сбрасывает ту карту. Вы можете положить принадлежащую тому игроку карту с Приключением из изгнания на кладбище того игрока.
foreignNames.flavor: В диких дебрях вороны крадут куда больше, чем простые безделушки.

foreignNames.flavor: 幻野之中的乌鸦，偷的可不只有饰品。

originalText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You may put a card that has an Adventure that player owns from exile into that player's graveyard.

name: Murderous Rider // Swift End
text:
Lifelink
When Murderous Rider dies, put it on the bottom of its owner's library.

rulings.text: If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it's a token) or cease to be a copy (if it's a nontoken permanent), and so you won't be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn't casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.

If the target creature or planeswalker is an illegal target by the time Swift End tries to resolve, the spell won't resolve. You won't lose 2 life or exile Swift End. If the target is legal but not destroyed (most likely because it has indestructible), you do lose 2 life and exile Swift End.

An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it's in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose mana value is 1. It can't be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card's normal characteristics. The spell's color, mana cost, mana value, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it's legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can't cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won't be exiled and the spell's controller won't be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won't give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.
You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you'll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it's not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

foreignNames.name: Mörderische Reiterin // Promptes Ende
foreignNames.text:
Lebensverknüpfung
Wenn die Mörderische Reiterin stirbt, lege sie unter die Bibliothek ihres Besitzers.

foreignNames.text:

Oathsworn Knight attacks each combat if able.
If damage would be dealt to Oathsworn Knight while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, prevent that damage and remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

rulings.text: If Oathsworn Knight can't attack for any reason (such as being tapped or having come under that player's control that turn), then it doesn't attack. If there's a cost associated with having it attack, its controller isn't forced to pay that cost, so it doesn't have to attack in that case either.
Oathsworn Knight's last ability removes only one counter from it each time it would be dealt damage, not one counter per 1 damage prevented.

If multiple sources would deal damage to Oathsworn Knight simultaneously (for example, multiple creatures blocking it), its last ability applies once. All of that damage is prevented, and only one counter is removed.
If damage that can't be prevented is dealt to Oathsworn Knight, one counter is still removed from it.

name: Order of Midnight // Alter Fate
text:
Flying
Order of Midnight can't block.

rulings.text: You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you'll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it's not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it's a token) or cease to be a copy (if it's a nontoken permanent), and so you won't be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn't casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.

An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it's in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose mana value is 1. It can't be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card's normal characteristics. The spell's color, mana cost, mana value, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it's legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can't cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won't be exiled and the spell's controller won't be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won't give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.

name: Rankle, Master of Pranks
text:
Flying, haste
Whenever Rankle, Master of Pranks deals combat damage to a player, choose any number —
• Each player discards a card.
• Each player loses 1 life and draws a card.
• Each player sacrifices a creature.

rulings.text: If you really want, you can choose zero modes for Rankle's triggered ability, but carefully consider the hidden costs in not entertaining someone titled Master of Pranks.
You can't choose a mode more than once.
You can choose a mode even if some or all players will be unaffected.
For each chosen mode, perform that mode in its entirety before continuing on to the next chosen mode in the order printed.

As the first mode is performed, first the player whose turn it is chooses a card in hand without revealing it, then each other player in turn order does the same. Then all the chosen cards are discarded at the same time.

As the third mode is performed, first the player whose turn it chooses a creature they control, then each other player in turn order does the same, knowing the choices made before them. Then all the chosen creatures are sacrificed at the same time.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Rankle's second mode causes each team to lose 1 life twice.

•每位牌手失去1点生命且各抓一张牌。
•每位牌手各牺牲一个生物。

foreignNames.name: 惡戲之王蘭卡
foreignNames.text:
飛行，敏捷
每當惡戲之王蘭卡對任一玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，選擇任意數量的選項～
‧每位玩家各棄一張牌。
‧每位玩家失去1點生命且各抽一張牌。
‧每位玩家各犧牲一個生物。

originalText:
Flying, haste
Whenever Rankle, Master of Pranks deals combat damage to a player, choose any number —
• Each player discards a card.
• Each player loses 1 life and draws a card.
• Each player sacrifices a creature.

name: Reaper of Night // Harvest Fear
text: Whenever Reaper of Night attacks, if defending player has two or fewer cards in hand, it gains flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: If Reaper of Night attacks a planeswalker, the controller of the planeswalker is the defending player.

If the defending player has three or more cards in hand as Reaper of Night attacks, its ability won't trigger at all. If that player has three or more cards in hand as the ability resolves, it doesn't gain flying.
Once Reaper of Night's ability has resolved, the number of cards in defending player's hand no longer matters. Reaper of Night won't gain or lose flying if that number changes later in the turn.

An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it's in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose mana value is 1. It can't be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card's normal characteristics. The spell's color, mana cost, mana value, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it's legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can't cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won't be exiled and the spell's controller won't be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won't give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.
You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you'll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it's not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it's a token) or cease to be a copy (if it's a nontoken permanent), and so you won't be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn't casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.

foreignNames.name: Schnitter der Nacht // Furcht ernten
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn der Schnitter der Nacht angreift und falls der verteidigende Spieler zwei oder weniger Karten auf der Hand hat, erhält er Flugfähigkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignNames.name: Segador de la noche // Cosechar el miedo
foreignNames.text: Siempre que el Segador de la noche ataque, si el jugador defensor tiene dos o menos cartas en la mano, gana la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno.

foreignNames.name: Faucheur de la nuit // Moisson de peur
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que le Faucheur de la nuit attaque, si le joueur défenseur a deux cartes ou moins en main, il acquiert le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignNames.name: Mietitore della Notte // Raccogliere la Paura
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta il Mietitore della Notte attacca, se il giocatore in difesa ha due o meno carte in mano, ha volare fino alla fine del turno.

foreignNames.name: 夜の死神 // 恐怖心の収穫
foreignNames.text: 夜の死神が攻撃するたび、防御プレイヤーの手札にあるカードが２枚以下の場合、ターン終了時まで、これは飛行を得る。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — スペクター

foreignNames.name: 밤의 사신 // 공포 수확
foreignNames.text: 밤의 사신이 공격할 때마다, 수비플레이어가 손에 카드를 두 장 이하로 가지고 있다면, 밤의 사신은 턴종료까지 비행을 얻는다.

foreignNames.name: Ceifador da Noite // Colher Medo
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que Ceifador da Noite ataca, se o jogador defensor tiver dois ou menos cards na mão, ele ganha voar até o final do turno.

foreignNames.name: Ночной Жнец // Жатва Страха
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда Ночной Жнец атакует, если у защищающегося игрока не более двух карт в руке, он получает Полет до конца хода.

foreignNames.name: 暗夜死神 // 收割恐惧
foreignNames.text: 每当暗夜死神攻击时，若防御牌手的手牌为两张或更少，则它获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

foreignNames.name: 暗夜死神 // 收割恐懼
foreignNames.text: 每當暗夜死神攻擊時，若防禦玩家的手牌為兩張或更少，則它獲得飛行異能直到回合結束。

foreignNames.text: L'adversaire ciblé se défausse de deux cartes. (Puis exilez cette carte. Vous pouvez lancer la créature plus tard depuis l'exil.)

foreignNames.name: Mietitore della Notte // Raccogliere la Paura
foreignNames.text: Un avversario bersaglio scarta due carte. (Poi esilia questa carta. Puoi lanciare la creatura in seguito dall'esilio.)

foreignNames.name: 夜の死神 // 恐怖心の収穫
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカードを２枚捨てる。（その後、このカードを追放する。あなたは後で追放領域からこのクリーチャーを唱えてもよい。）

foreignNames.name: 밤의 사신 // 공포 수확

foreignNames.name: Ceifador da Noite // Colher Medo
foreignNames.text: O oponente alvo descarta dois cards. (Depois, exile este card. Você pode conjurar a criatura posteriormente do exílio.)

foreignNames.name: Ночной Жнец // Жатва Страха
foreignNames.text: Целевой оппонент сбрасывает две карты. (Затем изгоните эту карту. Позже вы можете разыграть эту карту как существо из изгнания.)

foreignNames.name: 暗夜死神 // 收割恐惧
foreignNames.text: 目标对手弃两张牌。（然后放逐此牌。之后你还可以从放逐区中施放该生物。）

foreignNames.name: 暗夜死神 // 收割恐懼
foreignNames.text: 目標對手棄兩張牌。（然後放逐此牌。之後你還可以從放逐區中施放該生物。）

originalText: Target opponent discards two cards. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

name: Reave Soul
text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor:
"Into amethyst, I pour
Envy's shadow, sorrow's gleam.
Lure the one whose scorn I bore
That I may hear one final scream."
—Barrow witch incantation

foreignNames.name: Seelenraub
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl mit Stärke 3 oder weniger.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Ein Amethyst dient mir als Krug —
Neides Schatten, Kummers Schein.
Locken, dessen Groll ich trug,
auf dass ich hör sein letztes Schrei'n."
—Beschwörungsformel der Grabhügelhexen

foreignNames.name: Desgarro espiritual
foreignNames.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo con fuerza de 3 o menos.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Brillante amatista ayúdame a ocluir,
toda mi envidia y mi pesar.
Embruja a quien me hizo sufrir,
hasta que ya no pueda gritar".
—Sortilegio de las brujas de los túmulos

foreignNames.name: Pillage de l'âme
foreignNames.text: Détruisez une créature ciblée de force inférieure ou égale à 3.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Dans l'améthyste, je joins
La lueur du chagrin, l'ombre de l'envie.
Attirez celui dont j'ai supporté le dédain
Que j'entende enfin un dernier cri. »
—Incantation de l'envoûteuse des tumulus

foreignNames.name: Rubare l'Anima
foreignNames.text: Distruggi una creatura bersaglio con forza pari o inferiore a 3.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Nell'ametista, vado a versare
L'ombra dell'invidia, lo scintillio del dolore.
Seduci chi il suo sdegno mi ha fatto sopportare
Ché io possa udire il suo ultimo clamore."
—Incantesimo delle streghe dei tumuli

foreignNames.name: 魂裂き
foreignNames.text: パワーが３以下のクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor:
「紫水晶に注ぎ込むは
嫉妬の闇に、悲しみの輝き。
つまらぬ者を引き寄せて
最期の叫びを聞かんとす。」
――墳丘の魔女の詠唱

foreignNames.name: 영혼 찢기
foreignNames.text: 공격력이 3 이하인 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"자수정에 부어라,
질투의 그림자를, 슬픔의 광채를.
내가 경멸하는 자들을 꾀어내
그들의 마지막 비명을 듣게 하라."
—고분 마녀 주문

foreignNames.name: Despojar Alma
foreignNames.text: Destrua a criatura alvo com poder igual ou inferior a 3.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Na pristina ametista eu despejo
Da inveja a sombra, do pesar o lampejo.
Atraia quem me regalou desprezo
Para que eu ouça seu grito final de desespero."
— Encantamento de bruxa da mamoa

foreignNames.name: Похищение Души
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевое существо с силой 3 или меньше.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Я в дорогой аметист заливаю
Черную зависть и горя дурман,
Чтобы презренный мой недруг попался
В страшной, мучительной смерти капкан».
— заклинание курганных ведьм

foreignNames.name: 裂魂术
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标力量等于或小于3的生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「水晶为器，注我心意：
忌妒难解，悲伤满溢；
心厌之人，速速靠近，
苦痛加身，魂魄散尽。」
～荒野巫婆咒文

foreignNames.name: 裂魂術
foreignNames.text: 消滅目標力量等於或小於3的生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「水晶為器，注我心意：
忌妒難解，悲傷滿溢；
心厭之人，速速靠近，
苦痛加身，魂魄散盡。」
～荒野巫婆咒文

originalText: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.

name: Revenge of Ravens
text: Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, that creature's controller loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor: Syr Tasdale declared that he never wanted to see the witch Ygretta again. Her familiars quickly granted his request.

rulings.text: The triggered ability of Revenge of Ravens resolves before any abilities the attacking player controls. If this causes the attacking player to lose the game, that player's triggered abilities won't resolve and no combat damage will be dealt.

foreignNames.name: Rache der Raben
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn eine Kreatur dich oder einen Planeswalker, den du kontrollierst, angreift, verliert ihr Beherrscher 1 Lebenspunkt und du erhältst 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.
foreignNames.flavor: Syr Tasdale verkündete, er wolle die Hexe Ygretta nie wieder sehen. Ihre Vertrauten gewährten ihm seine Bitte umgehend.

foreignNames.name: Represalia de los cuervos
foreignNames.text: Siempre que una criatura te ataque a ti o a un planeswalker que controlas, el controlador de esa criatura pierde 1 vida y tú ganas 1 vida.
foreignNames.flavor: Syr Tasdale declaró que no quería volver a ver a la bruja Ygretta, por lo que los familiares de ella le concedieron rápidamente el deseo.

foreignNames.name: Vengeance des corbeaux
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois qu'une créature vous attaque ou attaque un planeswalker que vous contrôlez, le contrôleur de cette créature perd 1 point de vie et vous gagnez 1 point de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: Syr Tasdale déclara qu'il ne souhaitait plus jamais revoir Ygretta. Les familiers de la sorcière accédèrent rapidement à sa requête.

foreignNames.name: Vendetta dei Corvi
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta una creatura attacca te o un planeswalker che controlli, il controllore di quella creatura perde 1 punto vita e tu guadagni 1 punto vita.
foreignNames.flavor: Syr Tasdale dichiarò di non voler rivedere mai più la strega Ygretta. I suoi famigli esaudirono rapidamente quel desiderio.

foreignNames.name: カラスの仕返し
foreignNames.text: クリーチャーが１体、あなたかあなたがコントロールしているプレインズウォーカーを攻撃するたび、そのクリーチャーのコントローラーは１点のライフを失い、あなたは１点のライフを得る。
foreignNames.flavor: タズデイル卿は魔女のイグレッタの顔など二度と見たくないと言い放った。イグレッタの使い魔がすぐにその要求に応じた。

foreignNames.name: 까마귀의 복수
foreignNames.text: 생물이 당신 또는 당신이 조종하는 플레인즈워커를 공격할 때마다, 그 생물의 조종자는 생명 1점을 잃고 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 타스데일 경은 마녀 이그레타를 두번 다시 보고 싶지 않다고 선언했다. 그녀의 하수인들이 빠르게 그의 요청을 들어주었다.

foreignNames.name: Vingança dos Corvos
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que uma criatura atacar você ou um planeswalker que você controla, o controlador daquela criatura perde 1 ponto de vida e você ganha 1 ponto de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: Syr Tasdale declarou que desejava jamais ver a bruxa Ygretta outra vez. Os familiares dela rapidamente lhe concederam o desejo.

foreignNames.name: Месть Воронов
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда существо атакует вас или planeswalker-а под вашим контролем, контролирующий то существо игрок теряет 1 жизнь, а вы получаете 1 жизнь.
foreignNames.flavor: Сейр Тасдейл заявил, что более не желает видеть ведьму Игретту. Ее питомцы мигом помогли этому желанию исполниться.

foreignNames.name: 乌鸦复仇
foreignNames.text: 每当一个生物攻击你或由你操控的鹏洛客时，该生物的操控者失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 塔戴尔爵士刚说完自己再也不想见到巫婆依葛塔，后者的佣兽很快便满足了他的要求。

foreignNames.name: 烏鴉復仇
foreignNames.text: 每當一個生物攻擊你或由你操控的鵬洛客時，該生物的操控者失去1點生命且你獲得1點生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 塔戴爾爵士剛說完自己再也不想見到巫婆依葛塔，後者的傭獸很快便滿足了他的要求。

foreignNames.name: Vernarrter Schwertmeister // Gunst erheischen
foreignNames.text: Lebensverknüpfung
foreignNames.flavor: „Meine Mission? Ich will Ayara heiraten. Und wenn es mich das Leben kostet."

foreignNames.name: Maestro espadachín enamorado // Ganarse el favor
foreignNames.text: Vínculo vital.
foreignNames.flavor: "¿Mi misión? Casarme con Ayara, por supuesto. O morir en el intento".

foreignNames.name: Maître d'épée amoureux // Bonnes grâces
foreignNames.text: Lien de vie
foreignNames.flavor: « Ma quête ? Ma foi, épouser Ayara. Ou mourir en essayant. »

foreignNames.name: Maestro di Spada Invaghito // Conquistare il Favore
foreignNames.text: Legame vitale
foreignNames.flavor: "La mia missione? Che domande, sposare Ayara. Anche a costo della vita."

foreignNames.name: 恋に落ちた剣士 // ご機嫌取り
foreignNames.text: 絆魂
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・騎士
foreignNames.flavor: 「僕の使命？もちろん、アヤーラと結婚することさ。命を懸けてもね。」

foreignNames.name: 매료된 검성 // 비위 맞추기
foreignNames.text: 생명연결
foreignNames.flavor: "내 목표 말인가? 아야라와 결혼하는 것이지. 아니면 그러다 죽던가."

foreignNames.name: Mestre Espadachim Apaixonado // Conquistar as Graças
foreignNames.text: Vínculo com a vida
foreignNames.flavor: "Minha demanda? Casar com Ayara, claro. Ou morrer tentando."

foreignNames.name: Влюбившийся Мечник // Заискивание
foreignNames.text: Цепь жизни
foreignNames.flavor: «Моя цель? Взять в жены Айару, конечно. Или умереть, пытаясь это сделать».

foreignNames.name: 痴迷剑师 // 阿谀奉承
foreignNames.text: 系命
foreignNames.flavor: 「我的使命？那还用说，当然是跟阿娅拉成婚。或者是死在成婚征途上。」

foreignNames.name: 癡迷劍師 // 阿諛奉承
foreignNames.text: 繫命
foreignNames.flavor: 「我的使命？那還用說，當然是跟阿婭拉成婚。或者是死在成婚征途上。」

originalText: Lifelink

name: Smitten Swordmaster // Curry Favor
text: You gain X life and each opponent loses X life, where X is the number of Knights you control.
flavor: "My quest? Why, to marry Ayara. Or die trying."

rulings.text: If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it's not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it's a token) or cease to be a copy (if it's a nontoken permanent), and so you won't be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn't casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Curry Favor causes the opposing team to lose X life twice, after you gain X life once.

An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it's in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose mana value is 1. It can't be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card's normal characteristics. The spell's color, mana cost, mana value, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it's legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can't cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won't be exiled and the spell's controller won't be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won't give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.
You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you'll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.

foreignNames.name: Vernarrter Schwertmeister // Gunst erheischen
foreignNames.text: Du erhältst X Lebenspunkte dazu und jeder Gegner verliert X Lebenspunkte, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Rittern ist, die du kontrollierst.

foreignNames.name: Maestro espadachín enamorado // Ganarse el favor
foreignNames.text: Ganas X vidas y cada oponente pierde X vidas, donde X es la cantidad de Caballeros que controlas.

foreignNames.name: Maître d'épée amoureux // Bonnes grâces
foreignNames.text: Vous gagnez X points de vie et chaque adversaire perd X points de vie, X étant le nombre de chevaliers que vous contrôlez.

foreignNames.name: Maestro di Spada Invaghito // Conquistare il Favore
foreignNames.text: Guadagni X punti vita e ogni avversario perde X punti vita, dove X è il numero di Cavalieri che controlli.

foreignNames.name: 恋に落ちた剣士 // ご機嫌取り
foreignNames.text: あなたはＸ点のライフを得て、各対戦相手はそれぞれＸ点のライフを失う。Ｘはあなたがコントロールしている騎士の総数に等しい。
foreignNames.type: ソーサリー ― 出来事

foreignNames.name: 매료된 검성 // 비위 맞추기
foreignNames.text: 당신은 생명 X점을 얻고 각 상대는 생명 X점을 잃는다. X는 당신이 조종하는 기사의 수이다.

foreignNames.name: Mestre Espadachim Apaixonado // Conquistar as Graças
foreignNames.text: Você ganha X pontos de vida e cada oponente perde X pontos de vida, sendo X o número de Cavaleiros que você controla.

foreignNames.name: Влюбившийся Мечник // Заискивание
foreignNames.text: Вы получаете X жизней, а каждый оппонент теряет X жизней, где X — количество Рыцарей под вашим контролем.

foreignNames.name: 痴迷剑师 // 阿谀奉承
foreignNames.text: 你获得X点生命且每位对手各失去X点生命，X为由你操控的骑士数量。

foreignNames.name: 癡迷劍師 // 阿諛奉承
foreignNames.text: 你獲得X點生命且每位對手各失去X點生命，X為由你操控的騎士數量。

originalText: You gain X life and each opponent loses X life, where X is the number of Knights you control.

name: Specter's Shriek
text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player exiles that card. If a nonblack card is exiled this way, exile a card from your hand.
flavor:
"Imagine having your skeleton extracted through your ear, one bone at a time."
—Corliss the Wanderer

rulings.text: If you have no cards in hand, you won't have to exile anything if you have the player exile a nonblack card from their hand.

foreignNames.name: Kreischen des Specters
foreignNames.text: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Du kannst davon eine Nichtland-Karte bestimmen. Falls du dies tust, schickt der Spieler die bestimmte Karte ins Exil. Falls auf diese Weise eine nichtschwarze Karte ins Exil geschickt wird, schicke eine Karte aus deiner Hand ins Exil.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Stell dir vor, dein Skelett wird dir zum Ohr herausgezogen, Knochen für Knochen."
—Corliss der Reisende

foreignNames.name: Chillido del espectro
foreignNames.text: El oponente objetivo muestra su mano. Puedes elegir de ahí una carta que no sea tierra. Si lo haces, ese jugador exilia esa carta. Si una carta que no sea negra es exiliada de esta manera, exilia una carta de tu mano.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Imagina que te extraen el esqueleto entero a través del oído, hueso tras hueso".
—Corliss, el Viajero

foreignNames.name: Cri du spectre
foreignNames.text: L'adversaire ciblé révèle sa main. Vous pouvez y choisir une carte non-terrain. Si vous faites ainsi, ce joueur exile cette carte. Si une carte non-noire est exilée de cette manière, exilez une carte de votre main.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Imaginez que votre squelette est extrait de votre corps par votre oreille, un os à la fois. »
—Corliss le vagabond

foreignNames.name: Strillo dello Spettro
foreignNames.text: Un avversario bersaglio rivela la sua mano. Puoi scegliere una carta non terra da quella mano. Se lo fai, quel giocatore esilia quella carta. Se una carta non nera viene esiliata in questo modo, esilia una carta dalla tua mano.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Immagina che ti estraggano lo scheletro da un orecchio, un osso per volta."
—Corliss il Viandante

foreignNames.name: 死霊の金切り声
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札を公開する。あなたはその中から土地でないカード１枚を選んでもよい。そうしたなら、そのプレイヤーはそのカードを追放する。これにより黒でないカードが追放されたなら、あなたの手札からカード１枚を追放する。
foreignNames.flavor:
「身体の骨が耳から吸い出されるのを想像してみろ。それも一本ずつだ。」
――放浪者コーリス

foreignNames.name: 스펙터의 비명소리
foreignNames.text: 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 손을 공개한다. 당신은 그중에서 대지가 아닌 카드 한 장을 선택할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 그 플레이어는 그 카드를 추방한다. 흑색이 아닌 카드가 이런 식으로 추방되었다면, 당신의 손에서 카드 한 장을 추방한다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"네 귀로 몸 안의 뼈들이 뽑혀 나오는 걸 상상해 봐. 한 번에 뼈 한 개씩 말이야."
—방랑자 코를리스

foreignNames.name: Guincho do Espectro
foreignNames.text: O oponente alvo revela a própria mão. Você pode escolher um card que não seja um terreno da mão dele. Se fizer isso, aquele jogador exila aquele card. Se um card que não seja preto for exilado dessa forma, exile um card de sua mão.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Imagine ter seu esqueleto extraído pela orelha, um osso de cada vez."
— Corliss, o Errante

foreignNames.name: Вопль Призрака
foreignNames.text: Целевой оппонент показывает свою руку. Вы можете выбрать из нее карту, не являющуюся землей. Если вы это делаете, тот игрок изгоняет ту карту. Если таким образом изгнана не являющаяся черной карта, изгоните карту из вашей руки.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Представь, как твой скелет вытаскивают у тебя через ухо — под одной кости за раз».
— Корлисс Странник

foreignNames.name: 幽灵尖啸
foreignNames.text: 目标对手展示其手牌。你可以选择其中一张非地牌。如果你如此作，则该牌手放逐该牌。如果以此法放逐一张非黑色的牌，则从你手上放逐一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor:
「就想象是把你全身的骨头一根一根地从耳朵抽出来。」
～云游者柯力斯

foreignNames.name: 幽靈尖嘯
foreignNames.text: 目標對手展示其手牌。你可以選擇其中一張非地牌。如果你如此作，則該玩家放逐該牌。如果以此法放逐一張非黑色的牌，則從你手上放逐一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor:
「就想像是把你全身的骨頭一根一根地從耳朵抽出來。」
～雲遊者柯力斯

originalText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player exiles that card. If a nonblack card is exiled this way, exile a card from your hand.

name: Syr Konrad, the Grim
text:
Whenever another creature dies, or a creature card is put into a graveyard from anywhere other than the battlefield, or a creature card leaves your graveyard, Syr Konrad, the Grim deals 1 damage to each opponent.
{1}{B}: Each player mills a card.

rulings.text: If one or more creatures die at the same time as Syr Konrad, its first ability triggers for each of those creatures.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Syr Konrad's first ability causes it to deal 1 damage twice.

foreignNames.name: Syr Konrad der Grimmige
foreignNames.text:
Immer wenn eine andere Kreatur stirbt oder eine Kreaturenkarte von irgendwoher außer aus dem Spiel auf einen Friedhof gelegt wird oder eine Kreaturenkarte deinen Friedhof verlässt, fügt Syr Konrad der Grimmige jedem Gegner 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
{1}{B}: Jeder Spieler legt die oberste Karte seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.

foreignNames.name: Syr Konrad, el Tétrico
foreignNames.text:
Siempre que otra criatura muera, que una carta de criatura vaya a un cementerio desde cualquier parte que no sea el campo de batalla, o que una carta de criatura deje tu cementerio, Syr Konrad, el Tétrico hace 1 punto de daño a cada oponente.
{1}{B}: Cada jugador pone la primera carta de su biblioteca en su cementerio.

foreignNames.name: Syr Konrad, le Sinistre
foreignNames.text:
À chaque fois qu'une autre créature meurt, ou qu'une carte de créature est mise dans un cimetière depuis autre part que le champ de bataille, ou qu'une carte de créature quitte votre cimetière, Syr Konrad, le Sinistre inflige 1 blessure à chaque adversaire.
{1}{B} : Chaque joueur met la carte du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.

foreignNames.name: Syr Konrad, il Lugubre
foreignNames.text:
Ogniqualvolta un'altra creatura muore, una carta creatura viene messa in un cimitero da una zona diversa dal campo di battaglia o una carta creatura lascia il tuo cimitero, Syr Konrad, il Lugubre infligge 1 danno a ogni avversario.
{1}{B}: Ogni giocatore mette nel proprio cimitero la prima carta del proprio grimorio.

foreignNames.name: 厳格な者、コンラッド卿
foreignNames.text:
他のクリーチャーが１体死亡するか、クリーチャー・カードが１枚戦場以外の領域から墓地に置かれるか、クリーチャー・カードが１枚あなたの墓地を離れるたび、厳格な者、コンラッド卿は各対戦相手にそれぞれ１点のダメージを与える。
{1}{B}：各プレイヤーはそれぞれ、自分のライブラリーの一番上のカードを自分の墓地に置く。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・騎士

foreignNames.name: 엄숙한 자, 콘라드 경
foreignNames.text:
다른 생물이 죽을 때마다, 또는 생물 카드가 전장 이외의 어디에서든 무덤에 놓일 때마다, 또는 생물 카드가 당신의 무덤을 떠날 때마다, 엄숙한 자, 콘라드 경은 각 상대에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.
{1}{B}: 각 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위 카드 한 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.

foreignNames.name: Syr Konrad, o Sisudo
foreignNames.text:
Toda vez que outra criatura morre, ou um card de criatura é colocado em um cemitério vindo de qualquer lugar que não seja o campo de batalha, ou um card de criatura deixa seu cemitério, Syr Konrad, o Sisudo, causa 1 ponto de dano a cada oponente.
{1}{B}: Cada jogador coloca o card do topo do próprio grimório no próprio cemitério.

foreignNames.name: Сейр Конрад, Угрюмый
foreignNames.text:
Каждый раз, когда другое существо умирает, или карта существа кладется на кладбище откуда угодно, кроме поля битвы, или карта существа покидает ваше кладбище, Сейр Конрад, Угрюмый наносит 1 повреждение каждому оппоненту.
{1}{B}: каждый игрок кладет верхнюю карту своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.

foreignNames.name: 冷酷孔纳德爵士
foreignNames.text:
每当另一个生物死去，或一张生物牌从战场以外的任何区域进入坟墓场，或一张生物牌离开你的坟墓场时，冷酷孔纳德爵士向每位对手各造成1点伤害。
{1}{B}：每位牌手各将其牌库顶牌置入其坟墓场。

foreignNames.name: 冷酷孔納德爵士
foreignNames.text:
每當另一個生物死去，或一張生物牌從戰場以外的任何區域進入墳墓場，或一張生物牌離開你的墳墓場時，冷酷孔納德爵士向每位對手各造成1點傷害。
{1}{B}：每位玩家各將其牌庫頂牌置入其墳墓場。

originalText:
Whenever another creature dies, or a creature card is put into a graveyard from anywhere other than the battlefield, or a creature card leaves your graveyard, Syr Konrad, the Grim deals 1 damage to each opponent.
{1}{B}: Each player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

name: Tempting Witch
text:
When Tempting Witch enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a Food: Target player loses 3 life.
flavor:
"Murder clad in crimson beauty,
An end to life and love and duty."
—Barrow witch incantation

rulings.text: If an effect refers to a Food, it means any Food artifact, not just a Food artifact token. For example, you can sacrifice Gingerbrute to activate the last ability of Tempting Witch.
Food is an artifact type. Even though it appears on some creatures (such as Gingerbrute), it's never a creature type.
You can't sacrifice a Food token to pay multiple costs. For example, you can't sacrifice a Food token to activate its own ability and also to activate the ability of Tempting Witch.
Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.

foreignNames.name: Verführerische Hexe
foreignNames.text:
Wenn die Verführerische Hexe ins Spiel kommt, erzeuge einen Speise-Spielstein. (Er ist ein Artefakt mit „{2}, {T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.")
{2}, {T}, opfere eine Speise: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl verliert 3 Lebenspunkte.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Mord in Karmesin, schön, doch schlicht:
ein Ende für Leben und Liebe und Pflicht."
—Beschwörungsformel der Grabhügelhexen

foreignNames.name: Bruja tentadora
foreignNames.text:
Cuando la Bruja tentadora entre al campo de batalla, crea una ficha de Comida. (Es un artefacto con "{2}, {T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Ganas 3 vidas".)
{2}, {T}, sacrificar una Comida: El jugador objetivo pierde 3 vidas.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Muerte de rojo carmesí vestida,
final de amor, deber y vida".
—Sortilegio de las brujas de los túmulos

foreignNames.name: Envoûteuse tentatrice
foreignNames.text:
Quand l'Envoûteuse tentatrice arrive sur le champ de bataille, créez un jeton Nourriture. (C'est un artefact avec « {2}, {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Vous gagnez 3 points de vie. »)
{2}, {T}, sacrifiez une nourriture : Le joueur ciblé perd 3 points de vie.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Meurtre paré d'une beauté cramoisie,
Fin de l'amour, du devoir et de la vie. »
—Incantation de l'envoûteuse des tumulus

foreignNames.name: Strega Tentatrice
foreignNames.text:
Quando la Strega Tentatrice entra nel campo di battaglia, crea una pedina Cibo. (È un artefatto con "{2}, {T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Guadagni 3 punti vita".)
{2}, {T}, Sacrifica un Cibo: Un giocatore bersaglio perde 3 punti vita.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Morte ammantata di rosso splendore,
La fine della vita, del dovere e dell'amore."
—Incantesimo delle streghe dei tumuli

foreignNames.name: 誘いの魔女
foreignNames.text:
誘いの魔女が戦場に出たとき、食物・トークンを１つ生成する。（それは、「{2}, {T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：あなたは３点のライフを得る。」を持つアーティファクトである。）
{2}, {T}, 食物１つを生け贄に捧げる：プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは３点のライフを失う。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・邪術師
foreignNames.flavor:
「殺しが纏うは深紅の美。
命と愛と務めの終わり。」
――墳丘の魔女の詠唱

foreignNames.name: 유혹하는 마녀
foreignNames.text:
유혹하는 마녀가 전장에 들어올 때, 음식 토큰 한 개를 만든다. (음식 토큰은 "{2}, {T}, 이 마법물체를 희생한다: 당신은 생명 3점을 얻는다."를 가진 마법물체이다.)
{2}, {T}, 음식 한 개를 희생한다: 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 생명 3점을 잃는다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"살인은 진홍색 아름다움으로 휘감기고,
삶과 사랑 그리고 의무에 종말을 고한다."
—고분 마녀 주문

foreignNames.name: Bruxa Tentadora
foreignNames.text:
Quando Bruxa Tentadora entrar no campo de batalha, crie uma ficha de Comida. (Ela é um artefato com "{2}, {T}, sacrifique este artefato: Você ganha 3 pontos de vida.")
{2}, {T}, sacrifique uma Comida: O jogador alvo perde 3 pontos de vida.
foreignNames.flavor:
"A morte trajada em beleza carmesim.
Da vida, do amor, dos deveres o fim."
— Encantamento de bruxa da mamoa

foreignNames.name: Ведьма-Искусительница
foreignNames.text:
Когда Ведьма-Искусительница выходит на поле битвы, создайте одну фишку Еды. (Она является артефактом со способностью «{2}, {T}, пожертвуйте этот артефакт: вы получаете 3 жизни».)
{2}, {T}, пожертвуйте Еду: целевой игрок теряет 3 жизни.
foreignNames.flavor:
«В алом наряде убийца крадется,
Юная жизнь так легко оборвется».
— заклинание курганных ведьм

foreignNames.name: 惑诱巫婆
foreignNames.text:
当惑诱巫婆进战场时，派出一个食品衍生物。（食品衍生物是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。）
{2}，{T}，牺牲一个食品：目标牌手失去3点生命。
foreignNames.flavor:
「谋杀外衣腥红美丽，
终结一生爱恨情义。」
～荒野巫婆咒文

foreignNames.name: 惑誘巫婆
foreignNames.text:
當惑誘巫婆進戰場時，派出一個食品衍生物。（食品衍生物是具有「{2}，{T}，犧牲此神器：你獲得3點生命」的神器。）
{2}，{T}，犧牲一個食品：目標玩家失去3點生命。
foreignNames.flavor:
「謀殺外衣腥紅美麗，
終結一生愛恨情義。」
～荒野巫婆咒文

originalText:
When Tempting Witch enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a Food: Target player loses 3 life.

name: Wicked Guardian
text: When Wicked Guardian enters the battlefield, you may have it deal 2 damage to another creature you control. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: "Some are born to greatness. You were born to scrub greatness's floors."

rulings.text: If Wicked Guardian leaves the battlefield before its triggered ability resolves, you may still have it deal 2 damage to another creature you control and draw a card.
While resolving Wicked Guardian's triggered ability, you can't have it deal 2 damage multiple times or to multiple creatures to draw more cards.
If the damage Wicked Guardian deals is prevented (perhaps because you chose for it to deal 2 damage to a creature with protection from black), you still draw a card.
No player may take actions between the time you choose which creature (if any) is dealt damage and the time you draw a card if you chose one.

name: Witch's Vengeance
text: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor: The hex swept through the village, its citizens falling one by one.

rulings.text: You choose a creature type as Witch's Vengeance resolves, not as you cast it. No player may take actions between the time you choose a creature type and the time those creatures get -3/-3.

To choose a creature type, you must choose an existing creature type, such as Human or Knight. You can't choose multiple creature types, such as “Human Knight,” but choosing “Human” is enough to affect a Human Knight. Card types such as artifact can't be chosen; nor can supertypes such as legendary; nor can subtypes that aren't creature types, such as Vehicle.

Witch's Vengeance affects only creatures of the chosen type that are on the battlefield at the time it resolves. This includes creatures you control, creatures with hexproof, and creatures with protection from black. Creatures that enter the battlefield or become the chosen type later in the turn won't get -3/-3.

„Du glaubst, diese Mauern werden dich schützen? Du unterschätzt die Macht der Wildnis."
—Marawen, Grabhügelhexe

foreignNames.name: Soplaré y soplaré
foreignNames.text: Hasta tres criaturas objetivo no pueden bloquear este turno. Destruye de entre ellas las que sean Muro.
foreignNames.flavor:
"¿Crees que estos muros te protegerán? Ay, ay, qué poco sabes del poder de las tierras salvajes".
—Marawen, bruja de los túmulos

foreignNames.name: Souffler ta maison
foreignNames.text: Jusqu'à trois créatures ciblées ne peuvent pas bloquer ce tour-ci. Détruisez celles qui sont des murs.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Vous croyez être à l'abri derrière ces murs ? Vous avez décidément une piètre idée de la puissance des friches. »
—Marawen, envoûteuse des tumulus

foreignNames.name: Soffiare Via la Casa
foreignNames.text: Fino a tre creature bersaglio non possono bloccare in questo turno. Distruggi tutte quelle che sono Muri tra esse.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Credete che queste mura vi proteggeranno? Direi che sottovalutate il potere delle terre selvagge."
—Marawen, strega dei tumuli

foreignNames.name: 家の吹き飛ばし
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー最大３体を対象とする。このターン、それらのクリーチャーではブロックできない。そのうち壁であるクリーチャーをすべて破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor:
「そんな壁で防げると思ったのかい？まったく、僻境の力を分かっちゃいないね。」
――墳丘の魔女、マラウェン

foreignNames.name: 집 무너뜨리기
foreignNames.text: 생물을 최대 세 개까지 목표로 정한다. 그 생물들은 이 턴에 방어할 수 없다. 그 목표들 중 벽인 생물들을 모두 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"이 벽들이 널 보호해 줄 거라고 생각했어? 아이고, 너 야생지의 힘을 아주 우습게 봤구나."
—고분 마녀, 마라웬

foreignNames.name: Soprar Sua Casa
foreignNames.text: Até três criaturas alvo não podem bloquear neste turno. Destrua quaisquer delas que sejam Barreiras.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Vocês acham que essas paredes vão proteger vocês? Nossa! Vocês têm uma visão muito limitada do poder das terras selvagens."
— Marawen, bruxa da mamoa

foreignNames.name: Как Дуну, Как Плюну
foreignNames.text: Не более трех целевых существ не могут блокировать в этом ходу. Уничтожьте любые из них, которые являются Стенами.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Думаешь, эти стены защитят тебя? Ну и ну... ничего-то ты не знаешь о могуществе диких дебрей».
— Маравен, курганная ведьма

foreignNames.name: 狂风掀屋
foreignNames.text: 至多三个目标生物本回合不能进行阻挡。消灭其中所有为墙的生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「以为躲在墙后就能逃过一劫？唉，你们对幻野的力量一无所知。」
～荒野巫婆玛拉雯

foreignNames.name: 狂風掀屋
foreignNames.text: 至多三個目標生物本回合不能進行阻擋。消滅其中所有為牆的生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「以為躲在牆後就能逃過一劫？唉，你們對幻野的力量一無所知。」
～荒野巫婆瑪拉雯

originalText: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn. Destroy any of them that are Walls.

name: Bonecrusher Giant // Stomp
text: Whenever Bonecrusher Giant becomes the target of a spell, Bonecrusher Giant deals 2 damage to that spell's controller.
flavor: Not every tale ends in glory.

rulings.text: Bonecrusher Giant's ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.
If a spell targets Bonecrusher Giant more than once, its ability triggers only once.

An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it's in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose mana value is 1. It can't be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card's normal characteristics. The spell's color, mana cost, mana value, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it's legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can't cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won't be exiled and the spell's controller won't be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won't give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.
You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you'll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it's not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it's a token) or cease to be a copy (if it's a nontoken permanent), and so you won't be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn't casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.
Stomp only stops damage from being prevented by effects that specifically use the word “prevent.”

Protection prevents damage, so protection will be unable to prevent damage after Stomp has resolved. However, this won't allow a spell or ability to target illegally, even if that spell or ability would cause damage to be dealt.
If the chosen target is an illegal target by the time Stomp tries to resolve, the spell won't resolve. Damage can be prevented as usual.

foreignNames.name: Knochenmalmer-Riese // Stampfen
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn der Knochenmalmer-Riese das Ziel eines Zauberspruchs wird, fügt er dem Beherrscher des Zauberspruchs 2 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Nicht jede Geschichte endet ruhmreich.

foreignNames.flavor: No todas las fábulas terminan bien.

foreignNames.name: Géant craque-os // Piétineur

foreignNames.flavor: La gloire n'est pas toujours au rendez-vous à la fin de l'histoire.

foreignNames.name: Gigante Sbriciolaossa // Schiacciare
foreignNames.text: Quando il Gigante Sbriciolaossa diventa bersaglio di una magia, il Gigante Sbriciolaossa infligge 2 danni al controllore di quella magia.
foreignNames.flavor: Non tutti i racconti hanno un finale glorioso.

foreignNames.text: 뼈 파괴자 거인이 주문의 목표가 될 때마다, 뼈 파괴자 거인은 그 주문의 조종자에게 피해 2점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 모든 이야기가 영광스럽게 끝나는 것은 아니다.

foreignNames.name: Gigante Esmaga-ossos // Pisar

rulings.text: Claim the Firstborn can target any creature with mana value 3 or less, even one that's untapped or one you already control.
If a creature on the battlefield has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

name: Embereth Shieldbreaker // Battle Display
flavor: "Courage is the only shield I need."

rulings.text: An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it's in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose mana value is 1. It can't be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card's normal characteristics. The spell's color, mana cost, mana value, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it's legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can't cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won't be exiled and the spell's controller won't be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won't give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.
You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you'll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it's not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it's a token) or cease to be a copy (if it's a nontoken permanent), and so you won't be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn't casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.

text: Destroy target artifact. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)
flavor: "Courage is the only shield I need."

rulings.text: An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it's in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose mana value is 1. It can't be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card's normal characteristics. The spell's color, mana cost, mana value, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it's legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can't cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won't be exiled and the spell's controller won't be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won't give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.
You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you'll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it's not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it's a token) or cease to be a copy (if it's a nontoken permanent), and so you won't be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn't casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.

name: Fires of Invention
text:
You can cast spells only during your turn and you can cast no more than two spells each turn.
You may cast spells with mana value less than or equal to the number of lands you control without paying their mana costs.
flavor: "Just tell us how many you want and get out of the way."

rulings.text: If a spell has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.

If an effect allows or instructs you to cast a spell during another player's turn, you can't do so. The restriction of Fires of Invention takes precedence over that permission. Similarly, if an effect allows or instructs you to cast a third spell during your turn, you can't do so.
Fires of Invention doesn't impose any restrictions on playing lands or activating abilities.

Fires of Invention will look at the entire turn to see if you've cast two spells yet that turn, even if Fires of Invention wasn't on the battlefield when those spells were cast. Notably, you can't cast Fires of Invention and then cast two more spells that turn; if Fires of Invention was your second (or third, or fourth) spell that turn, you can't cast another spell at all.
If you cast a spell that was countered, it still counts as one of your two spells.
You may choose to pay the mana cost or an alternative cost for spells you cast, even if their mana value is less than or equal to the number of lands you control.

If you cast a card “without paying its mana cost,” you can't choose to cast it for any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs (such as that of Fling), you must pay those to cast the card.

If an effect says that you may cast a card that you couldn't otherwise cast if you pay an alternative cost (such as the flashback keyword), you have to pay that alternative cost if you use that permission to cast the card. You can't choose to cast it but cast it without paying its mana cost.
If you cast one card twice during a turn (such as by casting it as an Adventure and then casting it from exile as a creature), you've cast two spells.

name: Irencrag Feat
text: Add seven {R}. You can cast only one more spell this turn.
flavor: The greatest challenge isn't the stifling heat but the crushing weight of those who failed before.

rulings.text: Irencrag Feat's effect doesn't care how many spells you've cast so far in the turn. You can cast only one more.

Irencrag Feat's effect doesn't allow you to cast any spell you couldn't otherwise cast. For example, if an effect says you can't cast more than one spell each turn, Irencrag Feat won't let you cast a second.
If an effect allows or instructs you to cast another spell after you cast one more, you can't do so. The restriction of Irencrag Feat takes precedence over that permission.
Irencrag Feat's effect doesn't stop you from activating any abilities or from playing lands.

name: Joust
text: Choose target creature you control and target creature you don't control. The creature you control gets +2/+1 until end of turn if it's a Knight. Then those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor:
"Life is a tournament that rewards the bold."

rulings.text: You can't cast Joust unless you choose both a creature you control and a creature you don't control as targets.
The target creature you control gets +2/+1 only if it's a Knight as Joust resolves. It'll still fight if it doesn't get +2/+1.
If either target is an illegal target as Joust tries to resolve, neither creature will deal or be dealt damage.

If the creature you control is an illegal target as Joust tries to resolve, no creature gets +2/+1. If that creature is a legal target but the creature you don't control isn't, it still gets +2/+1 until end of turn if it's a Knight.

name: Merchant of the Vale // Haggle
text: {2}{R}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
flavor: "Buying old, worn-out junk. Selling marvels of real value."

rulings.text: An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it's in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose mana value is 1. It can't be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card's normal characteristics. The spell's color, mana cost, mana value, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it's legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can't cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won't be exiled and the spell's controller won't be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won't give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.
You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you'll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it's not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it's a token) or cease to be a copy (if it's a nontoken permanent), and so you won't be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn't casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.
You choose which card, if any, to discard while Haggle is resolving. In contrast, you must discard a card to activate the ability of Merchant of the Vale.

foreignNames.flavor: „Ich kaufe alten, abgenutzten Schrott und verkaufe wahrlich wertvolle Wunder."

foreignNames.flavor: « Acheter de la vieille camelote bonne à jeter. Vendre des merveilles inestimables. »

foreignNames.flavor: "Compro vecchie cianfrusaglie sciupate. Vendo meraviglie dal valore inestimabile."

foreignNames.name: 谷の商人 // 値切り

foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・農民

foreignNames.flavor: "Comprando sucata usada velha. Vendendo maravilhas de valor genuíno."

foreignNames.text: {2}{R}, сбросьте карту: возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: «Покупаю старый хлам. Продаю драгоценные чудеса».

foreignNames.name: 溪谷商人 // 讨价还价
foreignNames.text: {2}{R}，弃一张牌：抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「回收老旧废物。出售珍奇古玩。」

foreignNames.name: 溪谷商人 // 討價還價
